Metal Allergy.name: Metal Allergy
Metal Allergy.description: When a magnegor takes damage from a metal weapon or an effect with the metal trait, it takes @Damage[5[untyped]] additional damage and must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. The value of the sickened condition increases each time the magnegor fails such a check, to a maximum of 3.

Excavating Spines.name: Excavating Spines
Excavating Spines.description: The magnegor inadvertently digs a 10-foot-deep continuous trench in any square it Wallows through, as long as the ground in that space isn't made of stone, rock, or some other surface too hard to excavate. The trench is greater difficult terrain. At the GM's discretion, any excavated square can reveal a deposit of sedimentary rock filled with metal ore that has Hardness 7 and 28 Hit Points.

Wallow.name: Wallow
Wallow.description:
Requirements The magnegor is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}

Effect The magnegor rolls on its spine-covered back, up to its Speed, furrowing the earth and crushing any Large or smaller creatures in its path. This deals @Damage[4d10[piercing]] damage with a @Check[reflex|dc:24|basic] save; on a failed save, a creature wearing metal armor or made of metal is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the magnegor's magnetized coat (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 24). For each metal object or piece of equipment a restrained creature chooses to leave stuck to the magnegor, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attempts to Escape. A creature that relinquishes all its metal Escapes automatically. The magnegor can move at its full Speed while it has a creature restrained in this way, bringing the creature along.

Magnetized Coat.name: Magnetized Coat
Magnetized Coat.description: When a magnegor comes within 30 feet of a metal object or a deposit of metal ore, its thousands of wiry hairs stand on end, pointing towards the metal and creating a magnetic field. Metal items of light or negligible Bulk that touch the magnegor's coat adhere to it magnetically, requiring an Interact action to be pried free. Creatures wearing or primarily composed of metal treat all squares in a 10-foot radius around the magnegor as difficult terrain, unless they are moving directly towards it.

Stonefish.name: 石头鱼 Stonefish
Stonefish.publicNotes: 石头鱼利用其卓越的伪装能力等待并吞食小猎物，使自己与它们称之为家的珊瑚礁融为一体。较大的生物也不一定能幸免，尽管主要是由于意外接触到石头鱼的刺和它们剧烈的毒液。

Stonefish Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 3小时

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (10分钟)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[poison]]和笨拙2 (1小时)
Stonefish Venom.name: 石头鱼毒液 Stonefish Venom

Camouflage.name: 伪装 Camouflage
Camouflage.description: 石头鱼即便没有掩蔽，也可以在自然环境中@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]。

Defensive Spines.name: 防御性尖刺 Defensive Spines
Defensive Spines.description: 当一个生物进入某个已经有至少一条石头鱼的空间时，生物受到@Damage[1d4[piercing]]伤害，并且暴露于石头鱼毒液的影响。

Flynkett.name: Flynkett

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: The flynkett stretches its flaps to glide through the air. It moves 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. The flynkett can remain in the air long as it spends at least 1 action Gliding each round and does not Kettle Up.

Kettle Up.name: Kettle Up
Kettle Up.description: The flynkett uses its skin flaps to form a crude kettle. While Kettled Up, the flynkett can't use its claw Strike or take move actions. If the flynkett has been Kettled Up for 1 minute or longer, and its kettle is full of water (usually due to the flynkett being in the rain), the flynkett's kettle begins to boil, emitting a piercing whistle that causes all creatures within 30 feet to take a –2 penalty to Perception checks to hear sources other than the flynkett; this is an auditory effect. The flynkett can stop Kettling Up as a free action.

Spill.name: Spill
Spill.description:
Requirements The flynkett is Kettled Up

Trigger The flynkett takes physical damage or is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}

Effect The flynkett spills the contents of its full skin flaps, releasing its digestive juices in a cloud of acidic vapor that deals @Damage[2d8[acid]] damage to all non-flynkett creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} (@Check[fortitude|dc:18|basic] save). If the flynkett was boiling, the damage is increased to @Damage[4d8[acid]].

Flynkett.publicNotes:
The piercing whistle of the flynkett can often be heard over the harsh jungle rains, shrieking dissonantly when its cries combine with others of its pack. Although generally effective as a warning to nearby predators, these sharp cries also serve as a lure for reckless alchemists eager to study the creature's potent enzymes.

Flynketts' name, most theorize, is a corruption of "flinging kettle" or "flying kettle." They can't truly fly, instead using their skin flaps to glide in a manner similar to flying squirrels. However, the primary use of their skin flaps isn't for movement, but digestion. When it rains, flynketts roll up their loose skin, creating a crude sort of kettle in which to catch precipitation. The remarkable creatures' acid combines with the falling water to break down wood, soil, or even rocks into a nutritional stew. Therefore, the flynkett can flourish when introduced to any environment with frequent rain, something solid to stand on, and a lack of natural predators.

Although their acid can be harvested without harming a flynkett, the creatures rarely cooperate. If disturbed, particularly in the middle of feeding, they release clouds of acidic steam. They're also capable of spitting the fluid with deadly accuracy. Thankfully for those who run afoul of them, flynketts have no use for corpses and will generally break off pursuit when the interloper leaves their territory.

Several organizations and individual scholars have desperately sought to domesticate flynketts for use in alchemical production. To date, none of these efforts have been successful, though several abandoned labs still contain aggressive packs of flynketts who protect their new territory with ferocious tenacity.

Giant Fangtooth.name: 巨尖牙鱼 Giant Fangtooth

Deep Puncture.name: 深度穿刺 Deep Puncture
Deep Puncture.description: 被尖牙鱼噬咬命中并受到重击的生物会额外承受1d8点持续流血伤害。

Sunless Sight.name: 无光视觉 Sunless Sight
Sunless Sight.description: 当在明亮光照下时，尖牙鱼陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Giant Fangtooth.publicNotes: 这种生物标志性的大牙齿只需咬一口，就可以在几分钟内导致失血死亡；更糟糕的是，巨尖牙鱼愿意攻击比自己大得多的生物。

Skymetal Metamorphosis.name: 天金蜕变 Skymetal Metamorphosis
Skymetal Metamorphosis.description:
每条星腑多头蛇至少蜕变一次，会通过吞下一种特定的天金，内化其性质。如果你考虑给予一条星腑多头蛇一种以上的蜕变，则应提高其等级并修改其数据。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.Bds5RP9grJxhZALW]{精金 Adamantine} 星腑多头蛇的打击能绕开硬度，并视作为精金。星腑多头蛇获得对物理伤害的抗力10（精金除外）。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.lFRU108HnGlnMwqS]{渊铀Abysium} （灵光，毒素） 星腑多头蛇以体内的渊铀发出令人作呕辐射的灵光。任何在星腑多头蛇30尺内开始回合的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.N4l6y6v9pKy8Nj5i]{血汞 Djezet} （魔法） 星腑多头蛇对抗魔法时豁免获得+1状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.5bRdhgghjtWF1Vuu]{虚铅 Inubrix} 星腑多头蛇的打击忽视金属护甲的护甲专精效果带来的伤害抗力，且不会触发盾牌格挡反应动作，或是来自护甲性能符文的反应动作。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.sTlptNnUX2eA0DIH]{零晶 Noqual} 星腑多头蛇的打击和能力对有能力施放法术的生物造成的伤害获得+2状态加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.6Z0v9Tsthm9hyzb3]{山铜 Orichalcum} 当星腑多头蛇只剩下两颗头时，它会获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态。它只能用此额外动作进行行走或打击。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.Item.SXJRjw4R8m7NPDGc]{漠石 Siccatite} 星腑多头蛇受到火焰伤害时，它会变得过热，获得免疫火焰，以及对寒冷的弱点10。在处于过热时，寒冷伤害可以用于灼烧断颈。在星腑多头蛇受到寒冷伤害后，它会变得冰冷，获得免疫寒冷，以及对火焰的弱点10。

Head Regrowth.description:
星腑多头蛇初始拥有五颗头。生物可以专门将头作为目标并造成等同于头部生命值的伤害，来切断多头蛇的一颗头。任何生物的回合结束时，未被完全切断的头部都将恢复全部生命值。多头蛇可以使用多头蛇再生能力使被切断的头部重新长出。生物可以通过对断颈造成酸蚀或火焰伤害，灼烧它来阻止其重生。对于单目标的酸蚀或火焰效果必须指定灼烧某个特定的断颈，但溅射伤害或影响整个多头蛇占据空间的酸蚀或火焰效果能对所有断颈进行灼烧。如果切断头部的攻击造成任意酸蚀或火焰伤害，则断颈立即被灼烧。如果五颗头都被灼烧，则多头蛇会死亡。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uZJOdounIHaFDC1t]{效果：多头}
Head Regrowth.name: 头部重生 Head Regrowth

Reactive Heads.name: 多头反应 Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: 星腑多头蛇除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能获得一个额外的反应动作，但只能用此反应动作进行反应打击。多头蛇针对同一个触发动作只能使用一次反应动作，即便一个生物在它的触及范围离开多个方格，并且每次反应打击都必须使用不同的头部。每当多头蛇被砍掉一个头，它每轮就失去一个额外的反应动作。

Hydra Regeneration.name: 多头蛇再生 Hydra Regeneration
Hydra Regeneration.description: 星腑多头蛇拥有等同于3×头部数量的再生。如果多头蛇的身体失去了任意头颅并且余下的断颈还没有被灼烧，多头蛇可以通过再生能力恢复生命值之后尝试一次@Check[fortitude|immutable:true|dc:29]检定。如果成功，一个未被灼烧的断颈重新长出两颗头；如果大成功，两个未被灼烧的断颈分别各自长出两颗头。多头蛇长出的头的数量无法超过原本头数量的两倍。多头蛇的再生能力只有在它所有头都被砍断、所有断颈都被灼烧的情况下才会完全失效，此时它会死亡。

Stargut Hydra Heads.name: 星腑多头蛇之头 Stargut Hydra Heads
Stargut Hydra Heads.description:
HP (头)22，头部重生

免疫 区域伤害

弱点 挥砍10

Vomit Meteorites.name: 喷吐陨石 Vomit Meteorites
Vomit Meteorites.description: 星腑多头蛇摇摆整具身体，朝@Template[cone|distance:30]范围喷吐陨石块，对区域内所有生物造成@Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic]豁免）。区域内成为困难地形，持续1分钟，不过生物可以使用一个交互动作来清理一格的碎石。星腑多头蛇在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Vomit Meteorites]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用喷吐陨石。

Protoceratops.name: 原角龙 Protoceratops

Frill Block.name: 壳皱格挡 Frill Block
Frill Block.description:
需求 原角龙处于防御姿态

触发 一个相邻盟友将要受到物理伤害

效果 原角龙用壳皱部分挡下攻击，减少5点伤害。

Defensive Posture.name: 防御姿态 Defensive Posture
Defensive Posture.description: 原角龙收紧头部，露出坚固的壳皱，赋予相邻盟友AC+1环境加值。原角龙保持防御姿态直到其下回合开始，但只有在盟友保持相邻时才会赋予加值。

Protoceratops.publicNotes: 虽然原角龙没有像它更大的亲戚三角龙那样独特的角，但它在战斗中却游刃有余，它能用尾巴将敌人击倒在地，并用坚固的壳皱挡住攻击。

Dreadful Resonance.name: Dreadful Resonance
Dreadful Resonance.description: 60 feet. Each creature that enters or starts its turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical failure) and take @Damage[3d8[sonic]] damage.

Enthralling Call.name: Enthralling Call
Enthralling Call.description: 1 mile. Each non-rumindrol creature that enters or starts its turn within the emanation must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to this effect for 1 day (1 hour on a critical failure). Any creature fascinated in this way will attempt to find the source of the rumindrol's cry, mindlessly wandering towards it.

Entropic Cry.name: Entropic Cry
Entropic Cry.description:
The rumindrol focuses its sonic emanations on a creature it's aware of within the area of its enthralling call aura. The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature becomes temporarily immune to Entropic Cry for 1 hour.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is sickened 2, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}.

Fast Swallow.name: Fast Swallow
Fast Swallow.description:
Trigger The rumindrol Grabs a creature

Effect The rumindrol uses Swallow Whole.

Inexorable.name: Inexorable
Inexorable.description: The rumindrol recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} conditions at the end of its turn. It's also immune to penalties to its Speeds and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition, and it ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: The rumindrol attempts individual Strikes against each creature in its reach. It can attempt up to one jaws Strike and any number of leg Strikes. Each attack counts toward the rumindrol's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all the attacks.

Motion Sense.description: A rumindrol can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
Motion Sense.name: Motion Sense

Majestic Presence.name: 威严气势 Majestic Presence
Majestic Presence.description:
90尺，DC 38。进入灵光范围的超大型或更小体型的生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:38]豁免。无论豁免结果如何，生物都将临时免疫泰坦巨龙的威严气势1小时。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物被泰坦巨龙@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，持续1轮。

失败 生物被迷魂2轮。

大失败 生物被迷魂1分钟。

Seismic Slam.name: 地震猛击 Seismic Slam
Seismic Slam.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 泰坦巨龙用后腿支撑站起，前腿重重地砸在地面上，发出雷鸣般的巨响，产生局部震颤，效果如同以自身为中心的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{地震术 Earthquake} ，不过此效果是非魔法的。裂隙不会在泰坦巨龙身下形成。

Sweeping Tail.name: 巨尾横扫 Sweeping Tail
Sweeping Tail.description: 泰坦巨龙将尾巴在@Template[cone|distance:30]范围内扫动。区域内的生物受到@Damage[8d10[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic]豁免）。泰坦巨龙扫尾的动量会让它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}直到其下回合开始。

Titanosaur.name: 泰坦巨龙 Titanosaur
Titanosaur.publicNotes: 泰坦巨龙是有史以来在格拉里昂地面上行走过的最大陆地动物，这种巨大的蜥脚类动物身长可达100尺以上，体重超过80吨。虽然它们通常只满足于吃下大量的植被，从而忽视较小生物的存在，但当泰坦巨龙在感到威胁时能造成堪比自然灾害的破坏。

Vicious Mauling.name: 凶猛撕咬 Vicious Mauling
Vicious Mauling.description: 食肉牛龙的颚打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的目标造成额外1d8持续流血伤害。

Headbutt.name: 头撞 Headbutt
Headbutt.description:
触发 一个生物在食肉牛龙角打击的触及范围内结束移动动作

效果 食肉牛龙对触发生物进行一次角打击。

Powerful Charge.name: 强力冲锋 Powerful Charge
Powerful Charge.description: 食肉牛龙垂下角，向敌人冲去。它行走两次，然后进行一次角打击。如果它从起始位置开始移动了至少20尺，角打击的伤害会增加到2d12+9，并且在成功命中时将目标击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Carnotaurus.name: 食肉牛龙 Carnotaurus
Carnotaurus.publicNotes: 这种重达2000磅的掠食者名副其实，它低垂着独特的角冲撞猎物，将猎物撞到在地，然后在猎物重新站稳之前凶狠地撕咬倒地的受害者。不要被它们的体型所迷惑；这种巨大的恐龙在冲向潜在的猎物时，速度非常快。食肉牛龙具有很强的攻击性和领地意识，会毫不犹豫地猎杀任何不幸与它擦肩而过的生物。

Uncanny Mimicry.description: 虽然无法长时间交流，但齐笑魔可以精确地模仿类人的声音。如果有生物在齐笑魔听觉范围内说话，齐笑魔就能用该生物的声音说话，即使它所说出的话语与该生物说出的不同。听到齐笑魔说话的生物可以尝试一次@Check[will|dc:40]豁免来辨别声音来源。如果成功，该生物在对抗齐笑魔能力时所有豁免获得+1环境加值，持续1分钟。
Uncanny Mimicry.name: 诡异模仿 Uncanny Mimicry

Head Regrowth.name: 头部重生 Head Regrowth
Head Regrowth.description:
多头蛇初始拥有10颗头。生物可以专门将头作为目标并造成等同于头部生命值的伤害，来切断多头蛇的一颗头。任何生物的回合结束时，未被完全切断的头部都将恢复全部生命值。 多头蛇可以使用多头蛇再生能力使被切断的头部重新长出。生物可以通过对断颈造成酸蚀或火焰伤害，灼烧它来阻止其重生。对于单目标的酸蚀或火焰效果必须指定灼烧某个特定的断颈，但溅射伤害或影响整个多头蛇占据空间的酸蚀或火焰效果能对所有断颈进行灼烧。如果切断头部的攻击造成任意酸蚀或火焰伤害，则断颈立即被灼烧。如果10颗头都被灼烧，则多头蛇会死亡。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uZJOdounIHaFDC1t]{效果：多头}

Petty Whispers.name: 琐碎低语 Petty Whispers
Petty Whispers.description:
齐笑魔使用敌人的声音，在可能的盟友中间散播谎言和嘲笑，撕碎朋友间的信任。齐笑魔@Template[emanation|distance:60]范围内的生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:37]豁免。齐笑魔在1分钟内不能再次使用琐碎低语。

大成功 生物不受影响且临时免疫1天。

成功 同失败，但生物受到一半伤害且不陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}。

失败 生物受到@Damage[12d10[mental]]伤害，且陷入困惑1分钟。它可以在每回合结束时尝试一次新的豁免来结束困惑。

大失败 生物受到@Damage[15d10[mental]]伤害，且陷入困惑1分钟，不能进行豁免提前结束困惑。

Hydra Regeneration.name: 多头蛇再生 Hydra Regeneration
Hydra Regeneration.description: 多头蛇拥有等同于3×头部数量的再生。如果多头蛇的身体失去了任意头颅并且余下的断颈还没有被灼烧，多头蛇可以通过再生能力恢复生命值之后尝试一次@Check[fortitude|immutable:true|dc:43]检定。如果成功，一个未被灼烧的断颈重新长出两颗头；如果大成功，两个未被灼烧的断颈分别各自长出两颗头。多头蛇长出的头的数量无法超过原本头数量的两倍。多头蛇的再生能力只有在它所有头都被砍断、所有断颈都被灼烧的情况下才会完全失效，此时它会死亡。

Mocking Chorus Head.name: 齐笑魔之头 Mocking Chorus Head
Mocking Chorus Head.description:
HP (头部) 35，头部重生

免疫 区域伤害

弱点 挥砍10

Reactive Heads.name: 多头反应 Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: 多头蛇除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能获得一个额外的反应动作，但只能用此反应动作进行反应打击。多头蛇针对同一个触发动作只能使用一次反应动作，即便一个生物在它的触及范围离开多个方格，并且每次反应打击都必须使用不同的头部。每当多头蛇被砍掉一个头，它每轮就失去一个额外的反应动作。

Visage Strike.name: Visage Strike
Visage Strike.description:
Trigger A creature adjacent to the mirror wolf's visages damages mirror wolf's ally

Effect The mirror wolf teleports to the visage's spot, destroying the visage, and makes a jaws Strike.

Bond with Mortal.name: Bond with Mortal
Bond with Mortal.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The spirit guide spends 10 minutes to form a bond with a mortal creature. While the bond exists, the spirit guide increases their current and maximum Hit Points by 14, gains a +2 status bonus to their attack and damage rolls, and can communicate telepathically with the bonded mortal as long as the two beings are on the same plane. The spirit guide can only be bonded with one mortal at a time, and they can take this action again to end the bond or to form a new bond (which also ends the old bond). The bond also ends if the spirit guide or the mortal dies.

This bond strengthens the spirit guide's connection to the Universe. While bonded, the spirit guide loses the incorporeal and spirit traits, loses their immunity to disease, paralysis, and poison, along with their resistance to all damage, and changes their Strikes to deal the appropriate amount of physical damage (typically piercing or slashing) instead of force damage.

Bonded Strike.name: Bonded Strike
Bonded Strike.description:
Requirements The mirror wolf is currently Bonded with a Mortal

Effect The mirror wolf makes a jaws Strike. If this attack hits, the bonded mortal can spend their reaction to Strike the same target.

Lingering Assailant.name: Lingering Assailant
Lingering Assailant.description: The mirror wolf attacks with such speed it leaves a visage of itself behind. When the mirror wolf Strikes, they leave behind a visage in an adjacent square. The visage is treated as an ally for effects such as flanking and pack attack. A visage has AC 10 and 1 HP and lasts for 1 round.

Pack Attack.name: Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: The mirror wolf's Strikes deal 1d8 extra damage to creatures within reach of at least two of the mirror wolf's allies.

Strafing Strike.name: Strafing Strike
Strafing Strike.description: The mirror wolf makes a jaws Strike against a creature within range. The mirror wolf can then Stride and make a second jaws Strike against the same creature.

Focused Reflection.name: Focused Reflection
Focused Reflection.description:
Requirements The vibrant pup swarm is in bright light

Effect The swarm simultaneously turns to focus the light in an arcing beam, dealing @Damage[(6d12)[fire]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30] (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic] save). A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or 1 minute on a critical failure). The swarm can't use Focused Reflection again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Focused Reflection]]{1d4 rounds}.

Swarming Bites.name: Swarming Bites
Swarming Bites.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes @Damage[(2d6)[piercing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic] save).

Feel No Pain.name: Feel No Pain
Feel No Pain.description:
Trigger The vibrant pup swarm is critically hit by a Strike

Effect The worker pups become insensitive to pain and leap to the front. The swarm gains 10 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 round.

Reflective Skin.name: Reflective Skin
Reflective Skin.description: 10 feet. Other creatures in the aura are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}. The aura automatically activates when the swarm is in bright light and deactivates in dim light or darkness.

Orescent.name: Orescent
Orescent.description: A mjolgat can detect the ores of unrefined precious metals with its powerful nose. Common earth and stone do not impede the mjolgat from smelling ores deep within the ground.

Head On.name: Head On
Head On.description:
Trigger A creature the mjolgat can see targets the mjolgat with an attack

Effect The mjolgat swings its crest in the direction of the danger, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Hammerhead.name: Hammerhead
Hammerhead.description: The mjolgat rears upon its hind leg to crush an enemy with its jagged crest of bone. The mjolgat makes a bone crest Strike; on a hit, the mjolgat deals an extra die of damage. This counts as two attacks when calculating the mjolgat's multiple attack penalty

Punch-Drunk.name: Punch-Drunk
Punch-Drunk.description: If the mjolgat critically fails a bone crest Strike, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Rockbreaker.name: Rockbreaker
Rockbreaker.description: When the mjolgat deals damage to an object (such as a shield or an ore deposit), it deals double damage.

Shrieking Slam.name: Shrieking Slam
Shrieking Slam.description:
The mjolgat lets out a terrifying screech before bashing its head into the ground. Creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} of the mjolgat must attempt a @Check[will|dc:21] save. Regardless of the result of the save, they are then immune to Shrieking Slam.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

All Are One.name: 众成一 All Are One
All Are One.description:
频率 每回合一次

效果 守望者吸引能扩大其影响力的有机物。生物光大漩涡的范围和其触手触手打击的触及范围提高10尺，持续1分钟，最高到额外30尺。

Arctic Embrace.name: 极地之拥 Arctic Embrace
Arctic Embrace.description: 所有被守望者生物光大漩涡影响的生物受到@Damage[10d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:45|basic]豁免）。失败时，生物还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮。

Grasp of the Deep.name: 深渊抓握 Grasp of the Deep
Grasp of the Deep.description:
被守望者触手打击的生物获得寒冷弱点10，并在强韧豁免上承受-2状态减值，持续1轮。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.HzPg4iUmO3F6tbK6]{效果：深渊抓握}

I Am The Tide.name: 吾既潮汐 I Am The Tide
I Am The Tide.description: 守望者创造出三道线形的湍急水流，每道@Template[line|distance:120|width:10]{宽10尺，长120尺}。区域内的生物受到@Damage[18d8[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:45|basic]豁免）。守望者可以选择推离或拉近，所有在此次豁免中失败的生物朝所选方向移动至多40尺。守望者不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge I Am The Tide]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吾即潮汐。

Bioluminescent Maelstrom.name: 生物光大漩涡 Bioluminescent Maelstrom
Bioluminescent Maelstrom.description:
30尺。@Check[will|dc:45]

守望者的愤怒会在其周围形成炫目的风暴，使得该区域成为困难地形。进入风暴的生物必须尝试一次DC 45的意志豁免。豁免成功的生物临时免疫这引诱视觉效果24小时。

成功 生物不受影响。

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮，且其下轮进行第一个动作时，生物必须使用一个单动作尽可能地移动靠近守望者。

大失败 生物只要处于灵光范围内便陷入目眩状态。当生物在灵光内开始回合时，它必须使用其回合的第一个动作尽可能地移动靠近守望者。它在其回合结束时可以尝试一次新的豁免，成功时结束此效果。

What Lurks Beneath.name: 深渊潜袭 What Lurks Beneath

Voice of Nature.name: Voice of Nature
Voice of Nature.description: Though the Wardens of the Wild do not speak in words, they can communicate complex concepts flawlessly and wordlessly with any animal, beast, plant, or other creature of the natural world through prolonged eye contact. Sapient creatures with strong ties to the natural world, such as animal instinct barbarians or druids who speak the Wildsong, can somewhat understand a Warden of the Wild, though the meaning can be vague.

Warden's Crown.name: Warden's Crown
Warden's Crown.description: A Warden of the Wild's horned crown commands respect from wild creatures. Wild creatures native to a warden's biome automatically improve their attitude toward it by one step (up to friendly) and typically do not take hostile actions towards each other while in the warden's presence.

Warden of Oceans and Rivers.name: 海洋与江河的守望者 Warden of Oceans and Rivers
Warden of Oceans and Rivers.publicNotes:
复仇的当下 A Vengeful Present

在过去的时代，海洋与江河的守望者曾与陆地生物的世界息息相关，并且与他们的贸易渠道有着千丝万缕的联系。现在这些生物的后代无法依靠海洋的恩惠，并且认为自己必须尽其所能才能生存。渔人现在必须迅速和慎重了，海洋和河流都在热情地保护着它们的财产。因此，并非所有人都赞同新守望者的策略.……有些人希望看到旧时的方式得到恢复。
Warden of Oceans and Rivers.allSaves: 对抗原能时所有豁免+1状态加值

Auditory Hunter.name: Auditory Hunter
Auditory Hunter.description:
Trigger A creature within 15 feet uses an auditory action

Effect The drthak Strides or Swims towards the creature.

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: The drthak can hold its breath for about 2 hours.

Pull Under.name: Pull Under
Pull Under.description: The drthak can Swim at half Speed while it has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} in its jaws, carrying the creature along with it.

Resonant Jaws.name: Resonant Jaws
Resonant Jaws.description: When the drthak misses a screech Strike against a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} in its jaws, it deals that creature @Damage[2d6[sonic]] damage.

Sensitive Echolocation.name: Sensitive Echolocation
Sensitive Echolocation.description: The drthak can use its hearing as a precise sense with the listed range. If the drthak takes sonic damage beyond its resistance, its senses are overloaded and all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from it for 1 round.

Bubble Burst.name: Bubble Burst
Bubble Burst.description:
Requirements The drthak is underwater

Effect The drthak uses sonic power to push aside water in a @Template[emanation|distance:30], which then collapses in a crushing torrent. All creatures in the area, other than the drthak, take @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic] save).

Drthak.name: Drthak
Drthak.publicNotes:
Dischorans are a group of predators who hunt via focused sound. Though they possess protuberances that resemble eyes, these are actually auditory sensory organs that can pick up even the slightest sound and are used to locate prey with pinpoint accuracy.

Only a few types of dischorans have been identified, but they all share unifying features: front-facing pseudo-eyes, deceptive speed, and ravenous hunger. Their sensitivity to noise combined with their ability to weaponize sound are likely the primary reasons dischorans spend most of their time alone.

Drthaks are aquatic predators with long trailing fins that are rarely seen, clinging to coasts and estuaries where the high silt content makes them practically invisible to predators and prey alike. Some have been known to come inland, tracking their prey miles upriver before striking. The underwater environment alters the typical dischoran hunting behavior, with drthaks creating bubbles that implode to stun prey.

Metallic Coating.name: 金属涂层 Metallic Coating
Metallic Coating.description: 铠甲蝎狮的无武装攻击（包括尖刺）视作精金，寒铁，朝银和银。

Spell Reflection.name: 法术反射 Spell Reflection
Spell Reflection.description:
触发 对手以蝎狮作为施法目标且需要进行豁免

效果 蝎狮在豁免上获得+4环境加值。如果它豁免大成功，它可以选择30尺内一个非法术原本目标的生物。该生物成为法术的新目标，必须尝试自己的豁免对抗相同的DC。

Arrange Scales.name: 排列鳞片 Arrange Scales
Arrange Scales.description: 铠甲蝎狮弯曲鳞片下的肌肉，以临时获得更好的防护。铠甲蝎狮的AC获得+2环境加值，且由其选择对于钝击，穿刺或挥砍伤害获得抗力15。这些增益会持续到铠甲蝎狮下回合开始，或直到它再次使用排列鳞片。

Paired Spikes.name: 成对尖刺 Paired Spikes
Paired Spikes.description:
铠甲蝎狮从尾部甩出两根尖刺，至多以两个相互间距20尺的生物为目标。它对每个生物分别进行一次远程打击，每次为铠甲蝎狮的多重攻击减值算作一次单独的打击，但减值直到它进行完两次打击后才会增加。如果蝎狮只以一个生物为目标且命中了，该生物受到单独一次尖刺的正常伤害，但还会获得电击伤害弱点15，直到使用一个交互动作来移除尖刺。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.nW9GbEP1NqFodqE0]{效果：成对尖刺}

Snatch.name: Snatch
Snatch.description: The soniphak can Fly at half Speed with a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} in its claws, carrying that creature along with it.

Aftershock.name: Aftershock
Aftershock.description: Whenever a soniphak hits with a screech Strike, feedback deals each creature the soniphak has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} @Damage[1d6[sonic]] damage.

Sensitive Echolocation.name: Sensitive Echolocation
Sensitive Echolocation.description: The soniphak can use its hearing as a precise sense with the listed range. If the soniphak takes sonic damage beyond its resistance, its senses are overloaded and all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from it for 1 round.

Disruptive Screech.name: Disruptive Screech
Disruptive Screech.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet of the soniphak uses an auditory action

Effect The soniphak makes a screech Strike against the triggering creature. This disrupts a triggering concentrate action if the Strike is a critical hit.

Shattering Scream.name: Shattering Scream
Shattering Scream.description: The soniphak can focus its screech at a stone or rock surface within 60 feet to create an explosion in a @Template[burst|distance:15] from the point of impact. Creatures in the area take @Damage[5d6[piercing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic] save), and the area becomes difficult terrain due to fragments of loose stone.

Soniphak.name: Soniphak
Soniphak.publicNotes:
Dischorans are a group of predators who hunt via focused sound. Though they possess protuberances that resemble eyes, these are actually auditory sensory organs that can pick up even the slightest sound and are used to locate prey with pinpoint accuracy.

Only a few types of dischorans have been identified, but they all share unifying features: front-facing pseudo-eyes, deceptive speed, and ravenous hunger. Their sensitivity to noise combined with their ability to weaponize sound are likely the primary reasons dischorans spend most of their time alone.

Often mistaken for drakes, soniphaks glide above rocky or barren ground, picking out prey with their hearing. A hunting soniphak disables its targets with concentrated bursts of sound before snatching them up and feasting on the move. Despite being able to speak, soniphaks are no more social than other dischorans, generally responding to even the quietest attempts at communication with destructive shouting.

Petrify Body Part.description:
The stony bat breathes a puff of petrifying gas onto an adjacent creature, targeting a specific body part. The target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:20] save or be partially petrified for 1 minute, with an effect varying with the body part targeted.

  • Face The creature's face stiffens and a film of stone partially blocks its vision. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}.
  • Hand One of the creature's hands is petrified. It cannot Release items from that hand or use the hand for fine manipulation. Attack rolls with weapons held in that hand take a –2 status penalty.
  • Leg A patch of the creature's leg becomes inflexible and heavy. It takes a –10 status penalty to its Speed. If all of the creature's legs become petrified in this way, the creature's Speed is reduced down to 5 feet. At the GM's discretion, a creature with movement that doesn't rely on legs, such as creatures that Fly with wings, don't take a penalty to these other Speeds.
Petrify Body Part.name: Petrify Body Part

Petrify Vapor.name: Petrify Vapor
Petrify Vapor.description: The stony bat breathes petrifying gas in a @Template[cone|distance:15], too thin to harm creatures in the area. However, it petrifies ambient moisture, raining down a cascade of tiny stones onto any creatures in the space directly below the cone. The falling rocks deal @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:20|basic]). The stony bat can't use Petrify Vapor again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Petrify Vapor]]{1d4 rounds}.

Stone Feast.name: Stone Feast
Stone Feast.description: The stony bat specifically targets petrified body parts, which it can consume, unlike flesh. The stony bat's jaws deal an extra 1d6 damage against a creature that has been petrified, either partially or completely, and ignore the Hardness of petrified creatures.

Echolocation.name: Echolocation
Echolocation.description: The stony bat can use hearing as a precise sense with the listed range.

Crying Cicada.name: Crying Cicada

Steal Voice.name: Steal Voice
Steal Voice.description:
Requirements An enemy creature has spoken since the crying cicada's last turn

Effect The crying cicada learns and mimics the sound of its opponent's voice. It can't make new sentences, but it can choose to repeat select parts of the phrases it has heard. All non-cicada creatures within 30 feet, other than the owner of the stolen voice, must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:19] save to disbelieve the mimicry.

Wings Flat.name: Wings Flat
Wings Flat.description: When the crying cicada is still and perched on a tree, it blends seamlessly into the environment. It has an automatic result of 30 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as part of the tree.

Crying Cicada Poison.name: Crying Cicada Poison
Crying Cicada Poison.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:19]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 1d6 poison damage plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage plus slowed 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round).

Sob.name: Sob
Sob.description:
The crying cicada mimics the noise of a wounded animal or crying child. Non-cicada creatures within a @Template[emanation|distance:150] must attempt a @Check[will|dc:19] save or be distressed by the pleas for help. The effect lasts for 1 round, but if the cicada uses this ability again on subsequent rounds, it extends the duration by 1 round for all affected creatures. Once a creature succeeds at any save against Sob, that creature is temporarily immune to Sob for 24 hours.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature believes an animal or child needs help somewhere nearby. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, and it must spend each of its actions to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} or move closer to the cicada as expediently as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the creature is adjacent to the cicada, it stays still and doesn't act.

Wing Flurry.name: Wing Flurry
Wing Flurry.description: The crying cicada beats its wings together, exposing all creatures within a @Template[burst|distance:10] to crying cicada poison.

Crying Cicada.publicNotes:
These small insects are a nuisance and danger to small villages within Brevoy, taking over entire forests and blending in with the foliage. Also known as calling beetles, due to their ability to mimic and repeat the voices of their previous victims, crying cicadas wait for passersby to lure into the trees, fascinating their victims with their cries before fluttering their wings to release toxic dust. Once a target is near death, crying cicadas will take flight from the trees and land on the body to feed.

The scale dust of crying cicadas can be turned into an effective ingested poison, but obtaining a cicada and harvesting these scales is so dangerous that most would-be poisoners simply die in the process. Even finding the insects is dangerous enough; crying cicadas' natural stealth and dark coloration make them difficult to locate among the trees of a forest, and following their cries often leads one to fall victim to the very creatures they're hunting.

The longer a colony of crying cicadas stays in a forest, the wider their collection of cries grows. Often, a young colony will be able to replicate only the sounds of small, dying creatures, but larger, more established colonies will have the ability to mimic the sounds of children and dragons.

Deer Empathy.description: A weremoose can communicate with deer, including moose.
Deer Empathy.name: Deer Empathy

Cold Adaptation.name: Cold Adaptation
Cold Adaptation.description: The weremoose treats environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme.

Thundering Charge.name: Thundering Charge
Thundering Charge.description: The weremoose Strides twice and then makes an antler Strike. A Medium or smaller creature damaged by this attack must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:17] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Medium human with fist +11 for 1d4+6 bludgeoning,

or

Large moose with antler and hoof +11 for 1d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Weremoose.name: Curse of the Weremoose
Curse of the Weremoose.description:
This curse affects only humanoids.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:17]

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into the same kind of werecreature until dawn.

The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its antlers by 2.

When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #hours]]{2d4 hours}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{Effect: Moon Frenzy}

Chaos Falcon.name: 混沌隼 Chaos Falcon

Storm Bolt.name: 风暴束 Storm Bolt
Storm Bolt.description: 混沌隼的电束打击总是造成与其风暴核心灵光相同的伤害类型。

Stormsight.name: 风暴视觉 Stormsight
Stormsight.description: 风、降雨和云不会阻挡混沌隼的视觉；它忽略风暴、雾、降雨和类似状况带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Dive-bomb.name: 俯冲轰炸 Dive-bomb
Dive-bomb.description:
需求 混沌隼正在飞行

效果 混沌隼向下直线飞行两次。如果它在此次移动结束时触及地面或类似坚固物体，它的着陆会破碎表面，形成锋利的碎片和熔岩石滴，对@Template[emanation|distance:20]{20尺}内所有其他生物造成@Damage[4d6[fire],3d8[piercing]]{4d6火焰伤害与3d8穿刺伤害}（@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic]豁免）。

Flash Storm.name: 瞬时风暴 Flash Storm
Flash Storm.description: 水在混沌隼的15尺灵光内的灰烬微粒周围凝结，形成倾盆大雨冲刷下方的一切。该区域内的所有生物必须成功通过一次@Check[reflex|dc:26]豁免，否则会被推离20尺，如果它们在地面上开始或结束此次移动，则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Storm Nexus.name: 风暴核心 Storm Nexus
Storm Nexus.description: 15尺，@Damage[3d6[untyped]]，@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic]豁免。混沌隼被一团火山灰云包围，闪电在云中划出弧线，火山灰云在某些区域发出热光，在其他区域则结成冰。混沌隼可以通过一个具有专注特征单动作来将灵光的伤害类型改为寒冷，电击或火焰。

Chaos Falcon.publicNotes:
极端的天气孕育了混沌隼，赋予了它们其他元素鸟所没有的混合能力。对它们来说，闪电就像火焰一样自然，酷热就像严寒一样舒适。它们的攻击手段千变万化，即使是准备充分的人也会感到危险。

就像它们的元素表亲一样，混沌隼通常是风暴的预兆。它们也被视为火山活动的预兆，因为它们会跨越遥远的距离，在火山爆发时嬉戏起舞。由于这种联系，再加上它们喜欢降下冰与火的雨，附近的居民认为它们的存在很危险。

幸运的是，混沌隼是独居鸟类，它们喜欢远离文明的喧嚣。它们在火山喷口或地热活动区筑巢，依靠地热孵蛋，同时在附近的荒野中狩猎。除非它们的平静受到破坏或安全受到威胁，否则它们不太可能攻击在其栖息地活动的生物。

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The sky fisher reels in a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by its tentacles, pulling them into an adjacent space, and then attempts to Swallow them Whole (Large, 3d8+12 acid, Rupture 25). The sky fisher can only use Swallow Whole when using Abduct.

Enzymic Vent.description: ) The sky fisher vents flesh-eating enzymes into the air, dealing @Damage[3d6[persistent,acid]] damage and @Damage[3d6[persistent,bleed]] damage in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic] save). It can't use Enzymic Vent again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
Enzymic Vent.name: Enzymic Vent

Jet.name: Jet
Jet.description: The sky fisher quickly expels some of its gases to move swiftly through the air, Flying up to 100 feet in a straight line; this movement doesn’t trigger reactions.

Sky Fisher Venom.name: Sky Fisher Venom
Sky Fisher Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and can't speak above a whisper (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d8[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and can't speak (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d10[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

Transparency.name: Transparency
Transparency.description: y Unless it has fed recently, the sky fisher is naturally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Using non-hostile actions does not cause the sky fisher to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}. When it takes a hostile action of any kind, the sky fisher is hidden instead of undetected until the start of its next turn, as the vague outline of its many tendrils temporarily becomes faintly visible.

All Aboard.name: All Aboard
All Aboard.description: A decapod dinghy can carry up to 30 Bulk of creatures or unattended items on their back, such as five Medium creatures. The anemones' gentle hold on the passengers is sufficient in most situations, but while in combat, those passengers are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} if they want to take other actions while remaining on the decapod dinghy's back.

Anemone Transport.name: Anemone Transport
Anemone Transport.description: The decapod dinghy and all their willing passengers teleport to a patch of anemones within 10 miles large enough for the decapod dinghy to stand among them. Although the decapod dinghy doesn't need to see the location, they must have been there before. All creatures transported are temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Inflate Anemones.name: Inflate Anemones
Inflate Anemones.description: The anemones on the decapod dinghy's back inflate, enveloping all passengers and giving each passenger a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of the decapod dinghy's next turn.

Protect Passenger.name: Protect Passenger
Protect Passenger.description:
Trigger An enemy within 20 feet damages one of the decapod dinghy's passengers

Effect The decapod dinghy's anemones lash out for a tentacle Strike against the triggering creature.

Stinging Anemones.name: Stinging Anemones
Stinging Anemones.description: The decapod dinghy's anemones sting any number of creatures they choose among passengers and those the decapod dinghy has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}. The stings deal @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:26|basic]). On a failed save, that creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 hour.

Decapod Dinghy.name: Decapod Dinghy
Decapod Dinghy.publicNotes:
Decapod dinghies are massive crabs indigenous to the Okaiyo Ocean that often assist the local humanoids with transportation. They can understand Thalassic and are instantly recognizable by the colorful anemones they carry on their backs and in their front claws. Athamarus and merfolk are common sights atop decapod dinghies, lounging comfortably amidst the anemones and sharing food with their hosts.

This peaceful cooperation is indirectly caused by the legendary crustacean Tehialai-Thief-Of-Ships. Since Tehialai's rampages are a constant threat in the Okaiyo, the ancestors of the decapod dinghies bonded with other marine life to survive. Decapod dinghies' relationship with anemones is particularly tight, using the small creatures as poisonous extensions of their own bodies and using their response to movements in the water to compensate for the decapod dinghy's otherwise poor vision. In a region wracked by Tehialai's storms, everyone needs to band together, after all.

Scampering Theft.name: Scampering Theft
Scampering Theft.description:
The marp runs and attempts to snatch a purse, pendant, or other such object. The marp Strides up to their Speed, and they can move through enemy spaces during this movement. They then attempt to steal valuables from the target, who must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:22] save.

Success The marp fails to steal anything from the target.

Failure The marp steals one object from the target's possession that is made of or contains gold. They can't steal objects held by or permanently attached to the creature. If the object contains lead, the marp drops it at the target's feet. After stealing the object (or dropping it), the marp then Strides up to their Speed.

Goldsense.name: Goldsense
Goldsense.description: Marps can sense any accumulation of gold within range. They also can precisely measure the purity of gold by touch.

Panicked Withdrawal.name: Panicked Withdrawal
Panicked Withdrawal.description:
Trigger The marp takes damage from a melee Strike

Effect The marp drops any items held in their hands, then Climbs or Strides up to 15 feet.

Gold?.name: Gold?
Gold?.description:
The marp asks for gold from all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. Each target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:22] save or retrieve and drop gold valuables as a free action.

Critical Success The target can refuse the request, though they can also choose to willingly hand over any amount of gold. If they do so, they gain a +1 status bonus to the next saving throw they attempt within 1 minute, and they're temporarily immune to Scampering Theft for 1 minute.

Success The target can refuse the request.

Failure The target must drop coins, gold jewelry, or other objects worth 20 gp.

Critical Failure As failure, but 40 gp.

Prismatic Backlash.name: 虹彩反冲 Prismatic Backlash
Prismatic Backlash.description:
触发 一个生物成功灼烧了虹彩多头蛇的一个断颈

效果 虹彩多头蛇体内不稳定的虹彩能量涌出。与虹彩多头蛇相邻的每个生物承受混乱爆炸。

Prismhydra Heads.name: 虹彩多头蛇之头 Prismhydra Heads
Prismhydra Heads.description:
HP (头) 36，虹彩头部重生

免疫 区域伤害

弱点 挥砍15

Chromatic Explosion.name: 混乱爆炸 Chromatic Explosion
Chromatic Explosion.description: 虹彩多头蛇的头部充满了充满奥术能量。每当虹彩多头蛇成功用唾液打击一个目标，或当一个对手烧灼了虹彩多头蛇的一个头，该对手受到6d6与此头部易伤相同类型的伤害（通常为@Damage[6d6[acid]]{酸蚀}，@Damage[6d6[cold]]{寒冷}，@Damage[6d6[fire]]{火焰}或@Damage[6d6[electricity]]{电击}），进行@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic]豁免。

Hydra Regeneration.name: 多头蛇再生 Hydra Regeneration
Hydra Regeneration.description: 多头蛇拥有等同于3×头部数量的再生。如果多头蛇的身体失去了任意头颅并且余下的断颈还没有被灼烧，多头蛇可以通过再生能力恢复生命值之后尝试一次@Check[fortitude|immutable:true|dc:39]检定。如果成功，一个未被灼烧的断颈重新长出两颗头；如果大成功，两个未被灼烧的断颈分别各自长出两颗头。多头蛇长出的头的数量无法超过原本头数量的两倍。多头蛇的再生能力只有在它所有头都被砍断、所有断颈都被灼烧的情况下才会完全失效，此时它会死亡。

Prismatic Head Regrowth.name: 虹彩头部重生 Prismatic Head Regrowth
Prismatic Head Regrowth.description:
星腑多头蛇初始拥有8颗头。生物可以专门将头作为目标并造成等同于头部生命值的伤害，来切断多头蛇的一颗头。任何生物的回合结束时，未被完全切断的头部都将恢复全部生命值。多头蛇可以使用多头蛇再生能力使被切断的头部重新长出。生物可以通过对断颈造成特定类型伤害，灼烧它来阻止其重生。对于单目标的特定类型伤害必须指定灼烧某个特定的断颈，但溅射伤害或影响整个多头蛇占据空间的酸蚀或火焰效果能对所有断颈进行灼烧。如果切断头部的攻击造成任意特定类型伤害，则断颈立即被灼烧。

每颗头需要不同伤害类型来灼烧；通常，每两颗头分别容易受到酸蚀，寒冷，电击和火焰伤害，但也可能出现其他组合或更奇特的易伤。当虹彩多头蛇成功重生头部时，所有重新长出的头具有相同的易伤，且必须与虹彩多头蛇某个未被砍断的头的易伤相同。

如果8颗头都被灼烧，则多头蛇会死亡。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uZJOdounIHaFDC1t]{效果：多头}

Reactive Heads.name: 多头反应 Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: 多头蛇除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能获得一个额外的反应动作，但只能用此反应动作进行反应打击。多头蛇针对同一个触发动作只能使用一次反应动作，即便一个生物在它的触及范围离开多个方格，并且每次反应打击都必须使用不同的头部。每当多头蛇被砍掉一个头，它每轮就失去一个额外的反应动作。

Arcanotaxis.name: Arcanotaxis
Arcanotaxis.description:
Requirements The hexmoth has detected a source of magic with its arcanosense

Trigger The hexmoth's turn begins

Effect The hexmoth Flies or Strides up to its Speed toward the nearest source of magic it can detect.

Hexdust Wind.name: Hexdust Wind
Hexdust Wind.description: With a few fierce wingbeats, the hexmoth expels magical scale dust in a @Template[cone|distance:30]. This deals @Damage[10d6[untyped]] damage of the type to which the hexmoth is immune (@Check[fortitude|dc:23|basic] save). It can't use Hexdust Wind again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Hexdust Wind]]{1d4 rounds}.

Arcanosense.name: Arcanosense
Arcanosense.description: A hexmoth can sense sources of magic at the listed range as though it has a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} constant innate spell.

Advanced Arcanovore.name: Advanced Arcanovore
Advanced Arcanovore.description: A hexmoth has resistance 10 against all damage caused by spells. It's immune to one type of energy it consumed most as a hexworm, typically acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

Arcane Consumption.name: Arcane Consumption
Arcane Consumption.description: The hexmoth attempts to consume the magic of an adjacent magical effect or unattended magic item. It attempts a counteract check against the target with a +16 modifier. On a success, the magical effect ends. A magic item instead becomes a mundane item for 1 round. The hexmoth gains @Damage[2d8[healing]] Hit Points.

Venomous Flight.name: 毒液飞行 Venomous Flight
Venomous Flight.description: 沙漠蝎狮飞行两次，从尾刺上滴下毒液。在飞行过程中，它选择一个从正上方飞过的生物，该生物暴露于蝎狮毒。沙漠蝎狮不能飞到目标上空60尺以上，否则毒液会在下落过程中变得过于分散而无法生效。

Indomitable Beast.name: 不屈之兽 Indomitable Beast
Indomitable Beast.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 沙漠蝎狮降至0 HP

效果 沙漠蝎狮避免被击败，保持在1 HP，然后对触及范围内的一个生物进行一次尾刺打击。

Manticore Venom.name: 蝎狮毒 Manticore Venom
Manticore Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:32]

豁免检定 6 轮

阶段1 @Damage[3d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[4d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[5d8[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3}（1轮）

Scorpion Sting.name: 蝎刺 Scorpion Sting
Scorpion Sting.description: 沙漠蝎狮用尾刺打击一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物。此次攻击会深深地注入毒液，造成额外4d8毒素伤害，并且给予目标在对抗毒素时的初始豁免上-2环境减值。

Forage for Gems.name: Forage for Gems
Forage for Gems.description: The cave squirrel dives underground in search of gems. The cave squirrel Burrows up to its Speed. It must end its movement back on the surface. During its burrow, it happens upon [[/br 1d4 #Gems]] cheap gems (such as salt or quartz), which it stuffs in its cheeks, up to its maximum of 6.

Studded Cheeks.name: Studded Cheeks
Studded Cheeks.description: The cave squirrel can store up to six gems in its cheeks. It typically begins combat with all six, and it loses a gem each time it uses gem spit.

Defensive Scream.name: Defensive Scream
Defensive Scream.description:
Trigger The cave squirrel rolls initiative or has taken damage before initiative

Effect The cave squirrel lets out an ear-piercing shriek, alerting any other cave squirrels in the area to its plight. It uses Screaming Force.

Concussive Gem.name: Concussive Gem
Concussive Gem.description: On a critical hit on a gem spit Strike, the target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Natural Speed.name: Natural Speed
Natural Speed.description: A cave squirrel isn't affected by difficult terrain from earth or stone.

Screaming Force.name: Screaming Force
Screaming Force.description: The cave squirrel lets out a terrible scream. Non–cave squirrel creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:22] save or take @Damage[2d10[sonic]] damage. On a critical failure, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 minute. The cave squirrel can't use Screaming Force again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Screaming Force]]{1d4 rounds}.

Blood Scent.description: The wereshark can smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.
Blood Scent.name: Blood Scent

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Medium human with fist +14 for 1d4+7 bludgeoning,

or Large shark with jaws +14 for 1d12+7 piercing, no land Speed, and swim Speed 40 feet.

The wereshark doesn't have the amphibious trait in human or shark form and has the aquatic trait in shark form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Wereshark.name: Curse of the Wereshark
Curse of the Wereshark.description:
This curse affects only humanoids.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into the same kind of werecreature until dawn.

The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

Reactive Strike.name: Reactive Strike
Reactive Strike.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You lash out at a foe that leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Fish Fork.name: Fish Fork
Fish Fork.description:
Requirements The wereshark critically hit with a trident Strike on their most recent action this turn

Effect The wereshark digs their trident deep within their target, skewering it before taking a massive bite. The target of the Strike becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 18) and takes @Damage[1d4[bleed]] damage, and the wereshark attempts a jaws Strike against it. The wereshark can't use their trident while they have a creature grabbed with it, but they can pull the trident free with a single action that has the manipulate trait.

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws by 2.

When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #hours]]{2d4 hours}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{Effect: Moon Frenzy}

Protective Blubber.name: 保护性脂肪层 Protective Blubber
Protective Blubber.description: 豹海豹遭受的环境寒冷效果将降低一个级别（酷寒变极寒，极寒变严寒，依此类推）。

Whisker Sense.name: 胡须感知 Whisker Sense
Whisker Sense.description: 海豹可以使用其胡须精确感知指定范围内的振动，但这种感官仅限于水下。

Predatory Slam.name: 捕食猛击 Predatory Slam
Predatory Slam.description:
需求 豹海豹在水中

效果 豹海豹最多可以移动40尺，最终在陆地上停止移动。当它终止移动时，相邻的敌人会受到@Damage[2d10[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic]豁免），如果反射检定失败，敌人将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]。

Static Field.name: Static Field
Static Field.description:
The storm snake gathers all static electricity in the area before releasing it in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] that deals @Damage[3d12[electricity]] damage to all non-plant creatures (@Check[reflex|dc:19] save) and grants plant creatures 5 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute. Plant life in the area begins to grow significantly faster than the average for plants of their genus; in forests, fields, or otherwise floral locations, this immediately transforms the area into non-magical difficult terrain. The storm snake can't use Static field again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Static Field]]{1d4 rounds}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.MGlENdqYCAwBkyXt]{Effect: Static Field}

Static Shock.name: Static Shock
Static Shock.description:
Trigger A creature touches the storm snake or damages it with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon

Effect The triggering enemy is shocked for @Damage[2d8[electricity]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:19|basic] save). On a failed save, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: The storm snake redirects the lightning it has absorbed from storms, dealing @Damage[2d10[electricity]] damage to a single target within 20 feet (@Check[reflex|dc:19|basic] save). On a failure, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of its next turn.

Blood Scent.name: 血液嗅觉 Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: 鲨鱼能闻到水中最远1英里范围内的血腥味。

Deshell.name: 剥壳 Deshell
Deshell.description:
需求 一个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]于旋齿鲨的颚部

效果 鲨鱼撕咬该生物，造成@Damage[3d10[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic]豁免）

Towering Bite.name: Towering Bite
Towering Bite.description: The plated python lunges to its full length, making a jaws Strike with a reach of 60 feet. If the Strike hits, its target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} and pulled to an empty space adjacent to the plated python. The python can attack through any material it can burrow through, leaving a stone tunnel as normal.

Crumbling Earth.name: Crumbling Earth
Crumbling Earth.description: The plated python lets its breath sink into the ground, transforming it to brittle stone within a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. The stone is difficult terrain to all other creatures. Other creatures on the ground in this area when it transforms must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:29] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} as the stone beneath them crumbles to rubble. A creature immobilized in this way can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} normally or use three total Interact actions to dig themself free.

Petrify Prey.name: Petrify Prey
Petrify Prey.description:
Requirements The plated python has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Trigger The plated python begins its turn

Effect The python's breath seeps into the grabbed creature. That creature must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:32] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature's body hardens and stiffens, causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} for 1 round and Swallowed Whole.

Critical Failure The creature is petrified permanently and Swallowed Whole.

Stone Tunnel.name: Stone Tunnel
Stone Tunnel.description: When a plated python burrows through ground, it petrifies and destroys the material in front of it, leaving a 5-foot diameter tunnel in its wake. A plated python doesn't need to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} to pass through any space at least that wide.

Swallow Whole.name: Swallow Whole
Swallow Whole.description:
Large, @Damage[(3d10+5)[acid]], Rupture 20

This damage ignores the hardness of petrified creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Arcanosense.name: Arcanosense
Arcanosense.description: A hexworm can sense sources of magic at the listed range as though it has a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} constant innate spell.

Arcane Consumption.name: Arcane Consumption
Arcane Consumption.description: The hexworm attempts to consume the magic of an adjacent magical effect or unattended magic item. It attempts a counteract check against the target with a +11 modifier. On a success, the magical effect ends. A magic item instead becomes a mundane item for 1 round. The hexworm gains @Damage[2d8[healing]] Hit Points.

Arcanovore.name: Arcanovore
Arcanovore.description: A hexworm has resistance 5 against all damage caused by spells.

Arcanotaxis.name: Arcanotaxis
Arcanotaxis.description:
Requirements The hexworm has detected a source of magic with its arcanosense

Trigger The hexworm's turn begins

Effect The hexworm Strides up to its Speed toward the nearest source of magic it can detect.

Arcane Harmony.name: Arcane Harmony
Arcane Harmony.description:
Effect The virtuosic lyrebird sings a subtle trill that others can use to embellish their magic. The next virtuosic lyrebird to Cast a Spell within 60 feet of the first lyrebird that used Arcane Harmony chooses one of the following two benefits, after which the Arcane Harmony ends.

  • The spell gains a +2 status bonus to damage per spell rank.
  • One target of the spell takes a –2 status penalty to saves against the spell.

Spell Mimicry.name: Spell Mimicry
Spell Mimicry.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements A creature Casts a Spell of 3rd rank or lower since the end of the virtuosic lyrebird' s last turn, and the virtuosic lyrebird heard the incantation for the spell

Effect The virtuosic lyrebird learns the spell enough to mimic and cast it this turn, using as many actions as the original spell took.

Spellsong Casting.name: Spellsong Casting
Spellsong Casting.description: The virtuosic lyrebird's exquisite vocal control lets it cast spells purely through its song. While it must be able to vocalize to Cast a Spell, it doesn't need to gesture, removing the manipulate trait from any spell that it casts. If it Casts a Spell with the linguistic trait (usually with its Spell Mimicry), it can Cast that Spell in Common, even though the bird doesn't truly understand the language.

Counter-Melody.name: Counter-Melody
Counter-Melody.description:
Trigger An opponent within 60 feet Casts a Spell

Effect The virtuosic lyrebird makes a counteract check against the triggering spell ([[/r 1d20+14 #Counteract]]{+14} counteract modifier).

Eyespots.name: Eyespots
Eyespots.description: A giant tardigrade can't see anything beyond 30 feet.

Tun State.name: Tun State
Tun State.description:
Trigger The tardigrade would be reduced to 0 Hit Points or would die due to starvation, suffocation, or similar environmental causes

Frequency once per week

Requirements The tardigrade isn't already in tun state

Effect The giant tardigrade doesn't die but instead remains at 1 Hit Point and curls into a dry ball, called a tun. While in this tun state, the giant tardigrade is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, doesn't need to eat, drink, or breathe, and doubles its resistance to 20. It remains in tun state indefinitely until covered in significant amounts of water, at which point it begins to rehydrate, gaining regeneration 5. The regeneration persists until it reaches maximum Hit Points. The giant tardigrade then exits its tun state.

Vacuum Mouth.name: Vacuum Mouth
Vacuum Mouth.description:
Requirements The giant tardigrade doesn't have a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The giant tardigrade draws in air with its mouth. All creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:20] must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:25] save or be pulled adjacent to the giant tardigrade. The tardigrade chooses one creature that failed its save, Grabbing the target in its claws and making a stylet Strike.

Quickening Jolt.description: The coppermouth manipulates its own nervous system by increasing its reaction time, Striding and making two Strikes against different targets during the movement. Both attacks count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after it has made both attacks.
Quickening Jolt.name: Quickening Jolt

Venomous Spit.name: Venomous Spit
Venomous Spit.description: The coppermouth unleashes a stream of electrified venom in a @Template[line|distance:30]. The venom deals @Damage[8d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:22|basic]) and creatures that take damage from the venom are immediately exposed to coppermouth venom. The copper mouth can't use Venomous Spit again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Coppermouth Venom.name: Coppermouth Venom
Coppermouth Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison],1d6[electricity]]{1d6 poison and 1d6 electricity} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison],1d6[electricity]]{2d6 poison and 1d6 electricity} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison],2d6[electricity]]{2d6 poison and 2d6 electricity} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: The giant coppermouth can hold its breath for 1 hour.

Greater Electrolocation.name: Greater Electrolocation
Greater Electrolocation.description: A giant coppermouth can sense minute electrical charges in living creatures, which it can use as a precise sense at a range of 20 feet. This distance increases to 100 feet against any creature that has used an electricity effect within the last minute.

Multiple Reactions.name: Multiple Reactions
Multiple Reactions.description: A greater chimera gains 2 extra reactions each round that it can use only to make Reactive Strikes. It must use a different head for each reaction, and it can't use more than one on the same triggering action. If it loses one of its heads, it also loses one of these extra reactions.

Three-Headed Strike.name: Three-Headed Strike
Three-Headed Strike.description: The greater chimera makes a Strike with each of its heads, each at a –2 penalty and targeting a different creature. These Strikes count as only one attack for the greater chimera's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after it has made all three attacks.

Three-Headed.name: Three-Headed
Three-Headed.description: Any ability that would sever a greater chimera's head (such as a critical hit with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6xaxxKfvXED6LfIY]{Vorpal} weapon) severs one head at random. Losing a head doesn't kill a chimera (as long as it has at least one head left), but it does prevent it from making Strikes with the lost head or using any abilities granted by the head.

Royal Basilisk.name: 皇冠蛇怪 Royal Basilisk

Crowned Royalty.name: 戴冠皇室 Crowned Royalty
Crowned Royalty.description: 皇冠蛇怪的皇冠牢固地附着在其头上，但可以像持有的物品一样被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]。失去皇冠之后，皇冠蛇怪对毒素的掌控会被削弱，失去其毒雾遮蔽能力。皇冠蛇怪可以通过交互动作，装备一顶在其尾巴触及范围内的皇冠。皇冠蛇怪的皇冠通常由铁制成，可以使其使用毒雾遮蔽能力，但由其他更奇异材料制成的皇冠可能赋予不同的能力。

Miasmatic Shroud.name: 毒雾遮蔽 Miasmatic Shroud
Miasmatic Shroud.description: 15尺。皇冠蛇怪呼吸中的毒素使其周围的空气变得模糊，使它对灵光范围外所有生物获得隐蔽，但是它不能利用这种隐蔽来躲藏或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。当一个生物在灵光内结束其回合时，会暴露于皇冠蛇怪毒液之中。

Royal Basilisk Venom.name: 皇冠蛇怪毒液 Royal Basilisk Venom
Royal Basilisk Venom.description:
豁免检定 DC 36

最大持续 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[2d10[poison]]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[3d10[poison]]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}（1轮）

阶段3 @Damage[4d10[poison]]、笨拙3和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（1轮）

Stone-Hewing Spit.name: 破石吐息 Stone-Hewing Spit
Stone-Hewing Spit.description: 皇冠蛇怪以巨大的力量喷出其毒液，对@Template[line|distance:240]范围内的生物造成@Damage[5d10[acid],5d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic]豁免），并使每个受伤的生物暴露于皇冠蛇怪毒液之中。该直线攻击能穿透硬度小于20的障碍物，无视其提供的任何掩蔽带来的好处。皇冠蛇怪在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Stone-Hewing Spit]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用破石吐息。

Wrap in Coils.name: 缠卷 Wrap in Coils
Wrap in Coils.description:
需求 一个大型或更小的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}于皇冠蛇怪的嘴

效果 皇冠蛇怪将生物移动到其卷起的躯干中，解放自己的嘴用于攻击，然后对该生物使用高等紧勒。皇冠蛇怪的缠卷可以容纳最多能填满其占据空间的任意数量的生物。

Royal Basilisk.publicNotes: 皇冠蛇怪这个名字非常恰当，不仅因为它们头上的金属皇冠，还因为它们独特且强效的毒素。该生物的毒素表现为一种粘稠的蒸汽，接触到任何东西都会附着并侵蚀。它们对毒素的掌控确实付出了一定的代价，因为皇冠蛇怪没有能力将猎物石化。尽管皇冠蛇怪可以精心塑造皇冠，有些是由简单的铁制成，有些则由稀有的天金制成，但它们更喜欢收集由其他生物制作的皇冠。

Almiraj.name: 独角兔 Almiraj
Almiraj.publicNotes:
独角兔在几乎所有方面都与黄色的野兔极为相似……除了额头上突出的两尺长的黑色犄角。虽然它与温顺的独角兽都具有这一特征，但它们的相似之处也仅此而已。独角兔是凶猛的生物，以屠杀体型远大于自己的牲畜而闻名，而在绝境时，甚至会袭击人类。据说它们的凝视足以让即使是最勇敢的战士也逃之夭夭。

不同于普通的野兔，独角兔独来独往，领地意识极强。它们是适应性强的伏击猎手，具有追踪任何猎物所需的耐力和速度。它们会用颚和爪攻击，但主要以其犄角猛刺猎物的腹部而闻名。许多学者相信，这些生物散发出来的恐怖魔法光环源自它们的犄角。这种思维导致了独角兔攻击事件的增加，因为当地居民试图活捉这种生物并移除它的犄角，希望这能使其变得更加温顺。然而，这种希望并未实现，因为即使犄角被移除，独角兔的攻击性也丝毫未减，甚至可能更加凶猛。

冒险者如果能避开这种凶猛捕食者恐怖的犄角通常会觉得自己很幸运，但与被其锋利的牙咬住相比，这确实是一个更好的选择。独角兔有个坏习惯，它们会用嘴啃住猎物并猛烈地摇晃直到猎物变得软弱无力。如果这一招失败，它们会将猎物拖入地下，直到猎物在地底深处窒息身亡。几乎没有人能从独角兔的洞穴中逃生。

Frightful Presence.name: 恐怖威压 Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
5尺，@Check[will|dc:22]

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence] 豁免大失败的生物还会逃跑1轮。

Final Shake.name: 终结摇晃 Final Shake
Final Shake.description:
需求 一个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}于独角兔

效果 独角兔紧紧咬住该生物并剧烈摇晃，试图将其终结。该生物受到@Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，并且必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:20]豁免，否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。对于小型或更小的生物，豁免会受到-2环境减值。

Reactive Strike (Horn only).name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike (仅角抵)
Reactive Strike (Horn only).description:
@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ReactiveStrike]

逃跑的生物受到额外@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害。重击时，目标还会被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Goring Charge.name: 冲锋刺击 Goring Charge
Goring Charge.description: 独角兔低下头，向选定的猎物凶猛地冲去。独角兔行走两次。如果它的移动结束时进入了至少一个敌人的近战触及范围内，它对该敌人进行一次角打击。该打击会额外造成1d6持续流血伤害。

Into the Earth.name: 入土 Into the Earth
Into the Earth.description:
需求 一只中型或更小的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}于独角兔

效果 独角兔试图带着猎物逃跑，钻入地下。独角兔最多以满速掘地，受擒的生物必须通过一次@Check[reflex|dc:20]豁免，否则将被拖入地下。如果目标通过豁免，它将逃脱并且独角兔继续正常掘地；如果豁免失败，受擒的生物必须立即屏住呼吸，否则将在泥土下窒息。

Majungasaurus.name: 玛君龙 Majungasaurus

Frightened Prey.name: 恐吓猎物 Frightened Prey
Frightened Prey.description: 处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}状态的生物对玛君龙@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。

Startling Roar.name: 开场咆哮 Startling Roar
Startling Roar.description: 当玛君龙使用隐秘掷骰先攻时，它可以用自由动作对@Template[emanation|distance:30]内每个生物进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。无论结果如何，每个生物随后都将临时免疫1小时。

Crack Bones.name: 裂骨 Crack Bones
Crack Bones.description:
需求 玛君龙用颚@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒获 Grabbed}着一个生物

效果 玛君龙对该生物造成@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic]豁免）。此次豁免失败的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，直到其生命值完全恢复。

Majungasaurus.publicNotes: 玛君龙以蹲伏的姿势游走，它的姿态非常低，与猎物的视线紧紧相接。与大多数食肉恐龙不同的是，玛君龙主要是一种伏击型掠食者，它耐心地等待猎物来到近前，然后从掩体中冲出，发出一声标志性的吼声发动攻击。

Blooming Guardian.name: 绽放守护者 Blooming Guardian

Petal Form.name: 花瓣形态 Petal Form
Petal Form.description: 绽放守护者可以暂时化为一团旋转的花瓣和花粉云，从而越过荆棘并穿过裂缝。在林地地形中行走时，绽放守护者无视困难地形，并且只要有很小的通道即可穿过障碍物。

Budding Siphon.name: 萌芽虹吸 Budding Siphon
Budding Siphon.description: 20尺。绽放守护者处于持续分解状态；为了阻止这种熵增，覆盖其鹿角的花朵不断从周围区域虹吸生命。所有进入灵光或在其范围内开始回合的生物都会受到@Damage[6d4[void]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:36|basic]豁免）。在绽放守护者任何一轮开始时，只要其通过萌芽虹吸造成伤害，它会获得10点临时生命值，并且除了上回合第一个伤害的生物之外，上回合每多伤害一个生物，临时生命值就增加2点，最大达到20点生命值。

Full Bloom.name: 完全绽放 Full Bloom
Full Bloom.description: 绽放守护者鹿角上的花朵绽放，展现其光辉，同时侵蚀宿主。在这种架势下，绽放守护者的攻击额外造成2d4毒素伤害和5持续毒素伤害；命中时，目标必须通过@Check[fortitude|dc:36]豁免，否则会变得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。只要架势生效，绽放守护者就会受到@Damage[5[persistent,poison]]伤害。

Goring Charge.name: 冲刺撞击 Goring Charge
Goring Charge.description: 绽放守护者行走两次，并在任一次行走后进行鹿角打击。如果打击命中，绽放守护者会额外造成2d12钝击伤害，并且目标在下次针对萌芽虹吸的强韧豁免中受到-2环境罚值。

Wail of the Forest.name: 森林哀号 Wail of the Forest
Wail of the Forest.description:
需求 绽放守护者处于完全绽放中

效果 绽放守护者直面自己的死亡，使其花朵爆裂并喷洒花粉。所有@Template[cone|distance:40]范围内的生物受到@Damage[10d10[void]]伤害，尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:36]豁免。绽放守护者随后退出完全绽放，并在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Full Bloom]]{1d4轮}内无法重新进入。

大成功 无效果。

成功 生物受到一半伤害。

失败 生物受到全伤害并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}的生物失去力竭，并获得相同层数的流逝。

大失败 同失败，但伤害翻倍。

Blooming Guardian.publicNotes: 绽放守护者鹿角上的瘟疫之花在月光下最为美丽，此时它们完全绽放，散发出天体般的光辉。当绽放守护者接近生命周期的末尾时，它们会在森林中进行最后一次巡逻，其古老的身体会分解融入林下植被。

Flexible Dodge.name: Flexible Dodge
Flexible Dodge.description:
Requirements The hooplamander is Unfurled

Trigger The hooplamander is targeted by a Strike

Effect The hooplamander gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack and enters its Wheels Up stance.

Rollout Trample.name: Rollout Trample
Rollout Trample.description:
Requirements The hooplamander is Wheels Up

Effect As @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.UNah0bxXxkcZjxO3]{Trample} (Large or smaller, ridged tail, @Check[reflex|dc:22|basic]), except targets that critically fail their Reflex save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, and the hooplamander Unfurls at the end of its movement.

Unfurl.name: Unfurl
Unfurl.description:
Requirements The hooplamander is Wheels Up

Effect The hooplamander releases its tail, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaping} up to 20 feet as it exits its wheeled shape and unfurls to land on its four legs.

Wheels Up.name: Wheels Up
Wheels Up.description:
Requirements The hooplamander is Unfurled

Effect The hooplamander @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaps} and then rolls into its wheeled form. Any creature within 5 feet must succeed at a @Check[reflex|dc:22] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for one round. While it's Wheels Up, the hooplamander can't make Strikes and its Speed increases to 40 feet.

Thruneosaurus Rex.name: 斯戎暴龙 Thruneosaurus Rex
Thruneosaurus Rex.publicNotes: 名为斯戎暴龙的邪秽骇物并非自然的魔兽。它们是由尝试将恐龙的凶残与地狱之力结合起来的，切利亚斯的魔鬼信徒所创造，他们通过将一窝来自梅迪奥伽尔提岛的暴龙卵注入了魔鬼的腐液，并将孵化出来的怪物小恐龙以其赞助人的名字命名。尽管很少有记录和幸存者能准确说出实验是如何出错的，但实验对象还是逃脱了，它们的后代现在最常出没于切利亚斯东部的默语森林中。

Instinctive Teleportation.name: 本能传送 Instinctive Teleportation
Instinctive Teleportation.description:
触发 斯戎暴龙受到来自圣洁效果的伤害

效果 斯戎暴龙带着任何被它活吞的生物，传送到它能看见的60尺内的一处开放空间内。

Hellfire Blast.name: 狱火爆 Hellfire Blast
Hellfire Blast.description:
斯戎暴龙以三种方式之一引导硫磺狱火。斯戎暴龙选择一种效果，但不能连续两轮做出相同的选择。

  • 炎炎烈日 Blistering Sun （神术，火，邪秽） 斯戎暴龙在两角间燃起一团狱火球，能够向@Template[emanation|distance:30]范围辐射热量，造成@Damage[2d8[persistent,fire]]伤害。
  • 窒息毒烟 Choking Fumes （神术，毒素，邪秽） 斯戎暴龙突出一道@Template[cone|distance:60]的硫磺烟雾，造成@Damage[6d8[poison]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:38|traits:divine,poison,unholy|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。
  • 火焰光束 Fiery Beam （神术，火，邪秽） 斯戎暴龙的眼中发出一道@Template[line|distance:120]的地狱烈焰，造成@Damage[6d10[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:38|traits:divine,fire,unholy|basic]豁免）。

Warden of Peaks and Skies.name: 山峰与天空的守望者 Warden of Peaks and Skies
Warden of Peaks and Skies.allSaves: 对抗原能时所有豁免+1状态加值

Stormsight.name: 风暴视觉 Stormsight
Stormsight.description: 风、降雨和云不会阻挡守望者的视觉；她忽略风暴、雾、降雨和类似状况带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Song of the Skies.description:
守望者发出欢快的鸟鸣，为@Template[emanation|distance:60]内的所有盟友带来恩惠，并唤起飞行的自由。在接下来的1分钟内，受影响的盟友获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{行动无碍 Unfettered Movement}，60尺飞行速度，并且在他们处于空中时将所有位于地面的生物视作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.dZDpfgU63rXbBHpe]{效果：天空之歌}
Song of the Skies.name: 天空之歌 Song of the Skies

Tempest Downdrafts.name: 降下暴风 Tempest Downdrafts
Tempest Downdrafts.description:
触发 守望者飞行

效果 守望者扇动的翅膀会产生出强大的阵风，将较小的生物吹离航道。以守望者为中心，@Template[emanation|distance:60]范围，会充满闪电狂风，直到守望者下回合开始。生物必须成功通过@Check[reflex|dc:42]豁免才能在风中使用任意移动动作；飞行生物使用比掷骰结果差一级的成功度。大失败的生物将被吹离守望者30尺，击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}，并受到@Damage[4d6[electricity]]伤害。

Crystal Exhalation.name: 冰晶呼吸 Crystal Exhalation
Crystal Exhalation.description: 守望者吐息，形成冰晶风暴。@Template[cone|distance:60]范围内所有生物受到@Damage[4d8[cold],4d8[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:44|basic]豁免）。大失败时，生物还将被冰@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}。守望者不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Crystal Exhalation]]{1d4轮}内再次使用冰晶呼吸。

Orogenesis Dive.name: 造山俯冲 Orogenesis Dive
Orogenesis Dive.description: 守望者朝上直线飞行240尺。当她如此做时，从她起点开始的@Template[burst|distance:30]范围内地面升起一座120尺高的顶部为山峰的石柱，成为高等困难地形。该爆发范围内所有生物必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:44]豁免，否则会因突然的高度变化而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}状态。守望者然后向下直线飞到石柱山峰的顶部，将她的角插入岩石中。在她着陆时，新形成的山峰颤动起来。区域内所有生物必须成功通过一次@Check[reflex|dc:42]豁免，否则会跌落山峰，坠落120尺，并在区域外最近的方格中着陆。石柱是永久性的。

Voice of Nature.name: Voice of Nature
Voice of Nature.description: Though the Wardens of the Wild do not speak in words, they can communicate complex concepts flawlessly and wordlessly with any animal, beast, plant, or other creature of the natural world through prolonged eye contact. Sapient creatures with strong ties to the natural world, such as animal instinct barbarians or druids who speak the Wildsong, can somewhat understand a Warden of the Wild, though the meaning can be vague.

Warden's Crown.name: Warden's Crown
Warden's Crown.description: A Warden of the Wild's horned crown commands respect from wild creatures. Wild creatures native to a warden's biome automatically improve their attitude toward it by one step (up to friendly) and typically do not take hostile actions towards each other while in the warden's presence.

Warden of Peaks and Skies.publicNotes:
守望者的祝福 Warden's Blessing

传说中，山峰和天空的守守望者会邀请那些他特别青睐的人进入他的家——科达山脉深处一座中空山峰上的巢穴。在那里，客人将享受一场盛大的宴会，之后守望者会把他们变成雷鸟，这样他们就可以在余下的日子里享受天空了。如果有人拒绝，他也不会生气。

Magmatic Reflex.description:
触发 守望者成为一次攻击的目标

效果 守望者在跳离危险时喷出岩浆。此次喷射会对所有相邻生物造成@Damage[6d12[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:42|basic]豁免）。它随后@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}或快步离开，并在对抗触发攻击时AC获得+2环境加值。
Magmatic Reflex.name: 岩浆反射 Magmatic Reflex

Bury Beneath Stone.name: 葬于岩底 Bury Beneath Stone
Bury Beneath Stone.description:
需求 守望者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒获 Grabbed}一个生物；

效果 守望者尝试将受擒于其虫颚的生物楔入它下方打开的地缝中。守望者尝试一次@Check[athletics|defense:reflex]检定对抗受擒生物的反射DC。如果成功，它将该生物埋于地里。生物受到@Damage[10d10[bludgeoning]]伤害。它还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，且必须屏住呼吸否则将开始窒息，直到其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]（DC 42）。如果生物在回合结束时仍然被埋葬，它受到@Damage[5d10[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Called to Depths.name: 唤至深穴 Called to Depths
Called to Depths.description: 深穴呼唤着守望者，尤其是在它在空中移动时。当它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}时，它可以使用任何跳远未用完的移动来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]移动。此外，守望者可以掘地穿越任何泥土物质，包括岩石。当它如此做时，它以全额掘地速度移动。

Erupting Jump.name: 爆发跳跃 Erupting Jump
Erupting Jump.description: 守望者引出一股熔岩，然后随着其冷却跳跃降下一大团凝固重物。守望者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]至多其两倍速度。当它着陆时，冲击力会对@Template[emanation|distance:15]范围内的所有生物造成@Damage[6d12[bludgeoning]]伤害，进行@Check[fortitude|dc:42|basic]豁免。大失败时，生物还将被推离守望者10尺远。

Wall Cling.name: 攀墙 Wall Cling
Wall Cling.description: 岩窟与洞穴的守望者用它分节的足附着在表面上。它无需用手来保持留在墙壁或天花板上。

Obsidian Cage.name: 黑曜石囚笼 Obsidian Cage
Obsidian Cage.description: 迅速冷却的黑曜石会附着在目标身上，凝固在其肢体周围。目标必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:42]豁免。失败时，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}状态直到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}（DC 42）。大失败时，目标只要处于禁足状态便陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。

Vibratory Excavation.name: 振动挖掘 Vibratory Excavation
Vibratory Excavation.description: 守望者嘹亮的叫声撕裂土石。它在60尺内泥土物质或岩石上创造出10尺见方，50尺深的坑。

Voice of Nature.name: Voice of Nature
Voice of Nature.description: Though the Wardens of the Wild do not speak in words, they can communicate complex concepts flawlessly and wordlessly with any animal, beast, plant, or other creature of the natural world through prolonged eye contact. Sapient creatures with strong ties to the natural world, such as animal instinct barbarians or druids who speak the Wildsong, can somewhat understand a Warden of the Wild, though the meaning can be vague.

Warden's Crown.name: Warden's Crown
