Warden's Crown.description: A Warden of the Wild's horned crown commands respect from wild creatures. Wild creatures native to a warden's biome automatically improve their attitude toward it by one step (up to friendly) and typically do not take hostile actions towards each other while in the warden's presence.

Warden of Caverns and Burrows.name: 岩窟与洞穴的守望者 Warden of Caverns and Burrows
Warden of Caverns and Burrows.publicNotes:
相连的深穴 The Connected Depths

就像气流在天空中流动，海洋连接着世上的水域一样，岩洞和深穴也通过多种方式相互连接。地下熔岩流形成了隧道和通路。水的侵蚀也会在石头上形成洞穴系统。
Warden of Caverns and Burrows.allSaves: 对抗原能时所有豁免+1状态加值

Jungle Stride.description: The shotalashu ignores difficult terrain due to vegetation.
Jungle Stride.name: Jungle Stride

Empathic Communication.name: Empathic Communication
Empathic Communication.description: While a shotalashu can't speak, even telepathically, it understands simple commands in the languages it knows. It returns telepathic sensations of emotion to creatures touching it or the partner of its telepathic link at any distance.

Telepathic Link.name: Telepathic Link
Telepathic Link.description: A rider who would tame a shotalashu for a mount must first form a telepathic link with it. Establishing this link require spending a week with the desired mount and succeeding at a @Check[occultism|dc:21] check. Any creature with telepathic capabilities, such as telepathy, touch telepathy, empathic sense, or the ability to cast spells such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HqTI6wRrck1YXp3F]{Telepathy}, gains a +4 circumstance bonus to this check. This link remains and neither can form a new link until one member dies. The shock of a partner dying leaves the survivor @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 24 hours and prevents forming a new link for at least a month.

Telepathic Pounce.name: Telepathic Pounce
Telepathic Pounce.description:
The shotalashu hunts by pinning its foes with its mind. One creature within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[will|dc:18] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a –5 foot status penalty to its Speeds for one round.

Failure The creature takes a –10 foot status penalty to its Speeds for one round. The shotalashu can then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for one round. The shotalashu can Leap.

Razor-Edged Flight.name: 利刃飞行 Razor-Edged Flight
Razor-Edged Flight.description: 腾云狮鹫猛烈地向前滑翔，飞行两次。它可以在移动过程中任意位置对至多两个不同的目标进行一次翅膀打击；如果其中有打击重击，目标还将受到2d6持续流血伤害。

Terrifying Screech.description:
腾云狮鹫发出可怕的叫声，让猎物感到恐惧。@Template[emanation|distance:100]内的每个生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:30]豁免。无论结果如何，生物都将临时免疫1分钟。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 生物陷入惊惧2，且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}1轮。
Terrifying Screech.name: 恐惧尖嚣 Terrifying Screech

Disembowel.name: 开膛破肚 Disembowel
Disembowel.description:
需求 有生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}于腾云狮鹫的鸟爪

效果 狮鹫进行一次喙打击，撕裂猎物的血肉。如果此次打击命中，该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}（或增加1点流失状态值，最大到4）。

Dread Gaze.name: 恐惧凝视 Dread Gaze
Dread Gaze.description:
触发 一个生物在腾云狮鹫30尺内结束移动

效果 腾云狮鹫转过头来盯着触发生物，对其尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}。此次挫败士气的使用具有视觉特征而非听觉特征，且不会因为狮鹫语言不通而在检定上受到减值。

Carry Off.name: 携行 Carry Off
Carry Off.description: 腾云狮鹫可以在有生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}于鸟爪时全速飞行，且能带着受擒的生物一起移动。

Therizinosaurus.name: 镰刀龙 Therizinosaurus
Therizinosaurus.publicNotes: 乍一看，镰刀龙有着丰满，长着羽毛的身体和鸟类一样的喙。给许多观察者留下了近乎滑稽的印象。但当看到它的爪子时，这种印象很快就会消失，因为这种生物的爪子是六把邪恶的镰刀状利刃，只要轻轻一划，就能将敌人开膛破肚。尽管它们的外表令人生畏，但这些巨大的爪子主要是用来从高大的树木顶端分离出美味的树叶和树枝。尽管如此，旅行者通过镰刀龙领地时，明智的做法是远远躲开这种生物，以免惹上它出了名的臭脾气。

Stomp Pests.name: 踩踏虫豸 Stomp Pests
Stomp Pests.description: 镰刀龙四处踩踏，对每个相邻的生物造成@Damage[5d8[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:28|basic]豁免）。大型或更小体型的生物豁免失败时将被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Swiping Claws.name: 横扫利爪 Swiping Claws
Swiping Claws.description: 镰刀龙进行两次爪打击，每次针对不同目标。两次打击都会计入多重攻击减值，但在完成两次攻击后才会增加。

Winnowing Claws.name: 振翅利爪 Winnowing Claws
Winnowing Claws.description: 每当镰刀龙成功用爪打击一个大型或更小体型生物时，它都会将该生物拉向自己5尺（重击时为10尺）。

Auditory Swipe.name: Auditory Swipe
Auditory Swipe.description:
Trigger A creature within the morthak's reach uses an auditory action

Effect The morthak makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature.

Shattering Scrape.name: Shattering Scrape
Shattering Scrape.description: The morthak makes a claw Strike against a creature wearing stone or metal armor. If the Strike hits and the armor's Hardness is 12 or lower, that armor is broken.

Sensitive Echolocation.name: Sensitive Echolocation
Sensitive Echolocation.description: The morthak can use its hearing as a precise sense with the listed range. If the morthak takes sonic damage beyond its resistance, its senses are overloaded and all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from it for 1 round.

Morthak.name: Morthak
Morthak.publicNotes:
Dischorans are a group of predators who hunt via focused sound. Though they possess protuberances that resemble eyes, these are actually auditory sensory organs that can pick up even the slightest sound and are used to locate prey with pinpoint accuracy.

Only a few types of dischorans have been identified, but they all share unifying features: front-facing pseudo-eyes, deceptive speed, and ravenous hunger. Their sensitivity to noise combined with their ability to weaponize sound are likely the primary reasons dischorans spend most of their time alone.

Morthaks, being low, squat, and flat, resemble a crocodile rebuilt to dig like a mole. At home beneath vast meadows and plains, the only sign of their passing are the earthen mounds they leave behind when they emerge to hunt. Those who encounter them in the wild speak of the sub-aural rumble they produce as they disintegrate the earth with sonic blasts, a sound that's felt rather than heard.

Drain Potion.name: 吸取药水 Drain Potion
Drain Potion.description:
需求 炼药蜂没有储存药水

效果 炼药蜂吸取其触及内的药水，将其储存在内部。一个生物可以尝试进行@Check[reflex|dc:25]豁免以保护其所持有的药水。

Ingest Potion.name: 摄取药水 Ingest Potion
Ingest Potion.description: 炼药蜂消耗其体内储存的药水。如果药水具有治疗特征，炼药蜂将获得最大量的治疗效果。

Inject Potion.name: 注射药水 Inject Potion
Inject Potion.description: 炼药蜂将其储存的药水注射到其范围内的一个自愿生物体内。这会造成@Damage[1[piercing]]伤害，并使接受者获得正常饮用药水的效果。

Internal Cauldron.name: 内在坩埚 Internal Cauldron
Internal Cauldron.description: 在适当的饮食下，炼药蜂每两周会制造一个等级不超过6级的药水。大多数情况下，这是一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.G7haQ5gDt30ftJLC]{中等治疗药水 Healing Potion (Moderate)}。每只炼药蜂一次只能储存一个完成的药水。通常可以通过成功的@Check[nature|dc:23]或@Check[survival|dc:23]检定，从炼药蜂身上收获未使用的药水。

Potionsight.name: 药水视野 Potionsight
Potionsight.description: 炼药蜂复杂的眼睛可以让它们看到魔法药水的灵光，并本能地辨识出与其等级相同或更低的药水。这些灵光可以通过普通容器看到，但它们的眼睛没有特殊能力来感知或辨识非魔法溶液，如炼金灵药。

Smoke Susceptibility.description: An apothecary bee is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} if it starts its turn in heavy smoke.
Smoke Susceptibility.name: Smoke Susceptibility

Apothecary Bee.name: 炼药蜂 Apothecary Bee
Apothecary Bee.publicNotes:
这些巨大的蜜蜂以药草和魔法花朵的花蜜为食，自然地将液体加工成浓甜的药水。根据炼药蜂的具体饮食，它们能生产多种多样的药水，并将多余的存储在巢穴的蜂蜡房中。炼药蜂工蜂体长大约一尺，有着黄色和黑色的条纹。当携带药水时，蜜蜂的腹部会明显膨胀，并经常变色以匹配内部的药水。

炼药蜂制成的药水价值巨大，这导致了无数尝试驯化它们的危险而昂贵的尝试，这是一个风险和回报都很高的梦想。一旦建立起魔法花园，炼药蜂的蜂箱就趋于自给自足。蜂农可以潜在地指导它们的培育，但对于蜂巢的生存来说，他们不再是必需的。在奥西里昂的斯芬克斯河沿岸，一些古老且早已废弃的花园仍在生长，许多炼药蜂在那里寻觅符合它们标准的花朵。在最近一次挖掘到地表时，瑟基虫人社群迅速开始了与蜜蜂的“贸易”过程，建立栖息地并利用它们的自然魔法感应更好地照料一个大型蜂巢所需的大面积地块。另一方面，螨精通常会融入蜜蜂的社会结构中。

蜂巢生产的药水随着季节的变化而变化，这取决于可用的花朵。蜂农在创造专门产出特定药水的花园方面取得了进展，并且甚至开发了增加药水效果的采集技术。这些技术极其宝贵，严格保密，但甚至连带有诅咒效果的次品药水也在卡莉丝翠和诺格巴的追随者中找到了用途。

Reactive Strike (Tail only).name: Reactive Strike (Tail only)
Reactive Strike (Tail only).description:
Trigger A creature within your reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You lash out at a foe that leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Bond with Mortal.name: Bond with Mortal
Bond with Mortal.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The spirit guide spends 10 minutes to form a bond with a mortal creature. While the bond exists, the spirit guide increases their current and maximum Hit Points by 28, gains a +2 status bonus to their attack and damage rolls, and can communicate telepathically with the bonded mortal as long as the two beings are on the same plane. The spirit guide can only be bonded with one mortal at a time, and they can take this action again to end the bond or to form a new bond (which also ends the old bond). The bond also ends if the spirit guide or the mortal dies.

This bond strengthens the spirit guide's connection to the Universe. While bonded, the spirit guide loses the incorporeal and spirit traits, loses their immunity to disease, paralysis, and poison, along with their resistance to all damage, and changes their Strikes to deal the appropriate amount of physical damage (typically piercing or slashing) instead of force damage.

Bonded Strike.name: Bonded Strike
Bonded Strike.description:
Requirements The sunscale serpent is currently Bonded with a Mortal

Effect The sunscale serpent makes a jaws Strike. If this attack hits, the bonded mortal can spend their reaction to Strike the same target.

Sun's Heat.name: Sun's Heat
Sun's Heat.description: The sunscale serpent Flies up to its fly Speed. All creatures directly below the spaces it moves through must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:31] save or be exposed to sun's touch poison. The serpent cannot fly further than 60 feet above the target or the poison becomes too dispersed in the fall to take effect.

Sun's Touch.name: Sun's Touch
Sun's Touch.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:34]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[6d8[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[6d10[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 round)

Unleash the Sun.name: Unleash the Sun
Unleash the Sun.description:
Requirements The sunscale serpent is flying

Effect The sunscale serpent Flies up to its fly Speed, then crashes to the ground, releasing a wave of heat dealing @Damage[5d10[fire]] damage to all creatures within a @Template[burst|distance:60] and searing their eyes with the erupting glory of its scales. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round, and dazzled for 1 minute.

Reactive Strike (Tail Only).description:
Trigger A creature within your reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You lash out at a foe that leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
Reactive Strike (Tail Only).name: Reactive Strike (Tail Only)

Stylets.name: Stylets
Stylets.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes @Damage[4d8[piercing]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic] save). Creatures that fail their save become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} or increase their drained condition by one, to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

Eyespots.name: Eyespots
Eyespots.description: A tardigrade swarm can't see anything beyond 30 feet.

Tun Marbles.description: As the tardigrade swarm is damaged, the bodies of those that enter a tun state make the ground treacherous. When the tardigrade swarm drops below 70 Hit Points, the space they occupy is considered difficult terrain.
Tun Marbles.name: Tun Marbles

Running Attack.name: 奔袭 Running Attack
Running Attack.description: 伤齿龙行走，并在该次移动中任意一点进行一次爪打击。

Mimicry.name: 仿声 Mimicry
Mimicry.description: 伤齿龙可以重复至多12个上周听到的单词。如果它对成功通过一次对抗听众察觉DC的@Check[deception|defense:perception]检定，则声音与原声无异。伤齿龙无法复制基于声音的能力或法术，尽管它可以模仿法术的声音。

Troodon.name: 伤齿龙 Troodon
Troodon.publicNotes: 伤齿龙大约有3尺高，身长则为此两倍，有着有着细长的脖子和好奇的大眼睛。虽然它们不能完全理解语言，但它们在模仿语言方面有着非凡的天赋。

Launch Metal.name: Launch Metal
Launch Metal.description: The gecko repulses the metal attached to its body in all directions, dealing @Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:17|basic] save) to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:10]. The gecko can't use Launch Metal again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Launch Metal]]{1d4 rounds}.

Repel.name: Repel
Repel.description: The gecko manipulates its magnetic field to repel metal, humming audibly and gaining resistance 2 to damage from metal weapons and metal effects until the beginning of its next turn.

Greater Electrolocation.name: Greater Electrolocation
Greater Electrolocation.description: A magnetic gecko can sense minute electrical charges in living creatures, which it can use as a precise sense at a range of 20 feet. This distance increases to 100 feet against any creature that has used an electricity effect within the last minute.

Uncanny Climber.name: Uncanny Climber
Uncanny Climber.description: A magnetic gecko's feet allow it to climb virtually any surface, no matter how slick or sheer. If a gecko attempts an Athletics check to Climb and critically fails, it gets a failure instead.

Static Cling.name: Static Cling
Static Cling.description: If the gecko hits Small or smaller creature with its tongue, and the target is made of metal or is wearing metallic armor, the gecko's tongue latches on to the creature. The creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:17] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. While the gecko is Grabbing a creature in this way, it can attempt an @Check[athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the target's Fortitude DC to pull the creature to a space adjacent to the gecko. A creature grabbed in this way can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} normally.

Aerial Attack.name: 腾空攻击 Aerial Attack
Aerial Attack.description: 天角兽飞行，在移动中任意点用翅膀打击两次。每次攻击均计入天角兽的多重攻击减值，但减值只会在此次所有攻击完成后才会增加。

Beam of Light.name: 明光射线 Beam of Light
Beam of Light.description: 天角兽从角上发出强大的灼热射线。@Template[line|distance:120]范围内的生物受到@Damage[16d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:36|basic]豁免）。区域内的邪秽生物受到额外@Damage[8d6[spirit]]伤害。如果光线穿过魔法黑暗区域，或是以受到魔法黑暗影响的生物为目标，光线尝试反制黑暗（反制调整+28，反制环级8环）。天角兽在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge its Beam of Light]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用明光射线。

Ghost Touch.name: 幽冥 Ghost Touch
Ghost Touch.description: 天角兽的打击具有幽冥性能符文的效果。

Wild Empathy.name: 荒野共情 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 天角兽能与自然界的生物共感。天角兽可以使用交涉来对动物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]，并可以对它们@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]。

Draw in Magic.name: 绘制魔法 Draw in Magic
Draw in Magic.description:
触发 天角兽30尺内一个生物施放法术

效果 天角兽尝试反制触发法术（反制调整+28，反制环级8环）。如果成功，天角兽可以选择作为法术唯一目标获得触发法术的效果。

Mist Form.name: Mist Form
Mist Form.description: Over the course of a minute, a mist bear can transmute its form into a cloud of ethereal vapor. In this state it has resistance 10 to physical damage, is immune to precision damage, and can't use any actions with the attack or manipulate trait. It has a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The mist bear can return to solid form as a single action.

Clouded Charge.description: The mist bear Strides twice. During this movement, wisps of ethereal smoke trail from its body, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}. The mist bear then Strikes. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to this attack if the bear moved at least 20 feet.
Clouded Charge.name: Clouded Charge

Misty Mauling.name: Misty Mauling
Misty Mauling.description:
Requirements The mist bear has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The mist bear digs its claws into the grabbed creature as it dissipates into mist. The grabbed creature takes @Damage[3d8[slashing]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:25|basic] save). The mist bear gains the benefits of its Mist Form, Flies up to 10 feet, and then returns to its solid form.

Mist Bear.name: Mist Bear
Mist Bear.publicNotes:
Like the mundane bears they resemble, a mist bear is motivated by simple pursuits, such as food. Unlike other ursines, the mist bear can dissipate into a cloud of ethereal vapor, greatly complicating the efforts of neighboring humanoids to keep their provisions safe from the creature's depredations.

Fortunately, the mist bear follows a predictable pattern of behavior, usually foraging within the Universe for only a few months every year to gorge itself. Once sated, it then enters a state similar to hibernation where it drifts through the Ethereal Plane as a cloud of intangible vapor.

Swordfish.name: 剑鱼 Swordfish
Swordfish.publicNotes: 与普遍的看法相反，剑鱼的喙并不是用来刺穿猎物的，而是用来击晕或划伤猎物的。专门的器官帮助它在最冷的水域中保持温暖，从而提高其本已相当高的速度和反应能力。

Warm Brain.name: 温暖大脑 Warm Brain
Warm Brain.description:
需求 剑鱼在寒冷水域中

触发 剑鱼投掷先攻

效果 剑鱼尝试一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]。

Fast Sweep.name: 快速横扫 Fast Sweep
Fast Sweep.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 剑鱼对两个相邻目标进行两次长喙打击，这两次攻击掷骰有+1环境加值。

Lithe.name: Lithe
Lithe.description: A holdfast treats any tight space it can barely fit its head in or wider as difficult terrain and doesn't need to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze} to move through it.

Burst from Below.name: Burst from Below
Burst from Below.description: The holdfast Burrows and then Strikes. If the holdfast began this movement @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

Hold Tight.name: Hold Tight
Hold Tight.description:
Trigger A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the holdfast's jaws takes damage from another creature's Strike

Effect The holdfast Constricts the creature in its jaws.

Crush Throat.name: Crush Throat
Crush Throat.description: When a creature fails a save against the holdfast's Constrict, the creature's throat is held tight, stopping them from speaking as long as they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. This prevents the creature from casting spells with vocal incantations, as well as from using many sonic or auditory abilities.

Limb Regrowth.name: Limb Regrowth
Limb Regrowth.description:
A healthy mammoth land star typically has five limbs. A creature can sever a limb by targeting it and dealing damage equal to the limb's Hit Points. The mammoth land star can regrow a missing limb over the course of 24 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Dby3ecpqPheBrgnT]{Effect: Mammoth Land Star Limbs}

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: The land star blows air through its feet to hover 1 foot in the air and Strides twice with a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed, ignoring uneven ground and difficult terrain below it.

Pry.name: Pry
Pry.description:
Requirements The mammoth land star has a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} that is wearing armor

Effect The mammoth land star makes a feet Strike against a creature it has grabbed. If that Strike hits and the creature is wearing armor with Hardness 12 or lower, the armor is broken. This Strike doesn't further damage armor that's already broken.

Spiny Venom.name: Spiny Venom
Spiny Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:26]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2}

Stage 3 @Damage[2d8[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}

Regeneration 20 (reduced by 4 for each m.name: Regeneration 20 (reduced by 4 for each missing limb)

Regrowth.name: Regrowth
Regrowth.description: Whenever a limb is severed, it must attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5]. On a success, the limb will slowly begin to grow into a new mammoth land star over the course of a week, unless it is doused in acid or fire.

Detach.name: Detach
Detach.description:
Requirements The mammoth land star falls below half its total Hit Points

Effect The mammoth land star severs one of its own limbs as a distraction, then Strides three times. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Digest.name: Digest
Digest.description:
Requirements The mammoth land star has a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The mammoth land star extrudes its stomach onto its prey and digests it alive. The target takes @Damage[(2d12+6)[acid]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Mammoth Land Star.name: Mammoth Land Star
Mammoth Land Star.hp: regeneration 20 (reduced by 4 for each missing limb); limb regrowth

Hydra Regeneration.name: 多头蛇再生 Hydra Regeneration
Hydra Regeneration.description:
豁免失败时幻头蛇会长出两颗幻术头颅。

多头蛇拥有等同于3×头部数量的再生。如果多头蛇的身体失去了任意头颅并且余下的断颈还没有被灼烧，多头蛇可以通过再生能力恢复生命值之后尝试一次@Check[fortitude|immutable:true|dc:31]检定。如果成功，一个未被灼烧的断颈重新长出两颗头；如果大成功，两个未被灼烧的断颈分别各自长出两颗头。多头蛇长出的头的数量无法超过原本头数量的两倍。多头蛇的再生能力只有在它所有头都被砍断、所有断颈都被灼烧的情况下才会完全失效，此时它会死亡。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Regeneration]

Deceptive Regrowth.name: 虚幻再生 Deceptive Regrowth
Deceptive Regrowth.description:
幻头蛇初始拥有六颗头。生物可以专门将头作为目标并造成等同于头部生命值的伤害，来切断幻头蛇的一颗头。任何生物的回合结束时，未被完全切断的头部都将恢复全部生命值。幻头蛇可以使用多头蛇再生能力使被切断的头部重新长出。生物可以通过对断颈造成火焰伤害，灼烧它来阻止其重生。对于单目标的火焰效果必须指定灼烧某个特定的断颈，但溅射伤害或影响整个多头蛇占据空间的火焰效果能对所有断颈进行灼烧。如果切断头部的攻击造成任意火焰伤害，或是由寒铁武器造成，则断颈立即被灼烧。如果六颗头都被灼烧，则多头蛇会死亡。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.uZJOdounIHaFDC1t]{效果：多头}

Tyrafdir Heads.name: 幻头蛇之头 Tyrafdir Heads
Tyrafdir Heads.description:
HP (头) 30，虚幻重生

免疫 区域伤害

弱点 寒铁10，挥砍10

Noxious Exhalation.name: 喷吐毒气 Noxious Exhalation
Noxious Exhalation.description:
幻头蛇从所有口中喷出毒雾，扩散至@Template[emanation|distance:20]范围，对区域内所有生物造成@Damage[4d10[poison]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:24|basic]豁免）。任何豁免失败的生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:24]豁免，否则会获得心灵弱点10，以及意志豁免承受-1状态减值，持续24小时。幻头蛇在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Noxious Exhalation]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用喷吐毒气。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.G1pvduwOVRz4YFUF]{效果：喷吐毒气}

Deceptive Heads.name: 虚幻头颅 Deceptive Heads
Deceptive Heads.description:
幻头蛇虽然不聪明，但却十分狡猾，它会利用再生头颅的幻术来迷惑干扰对手。当幻头蛇重生头颅的强韧豁免失败，但没有大失败时，它会具现出幻影来模仿重生。这会产生两颗虚幻头颅，其功能与真实的头颅不同。只要存在一颗虚幻头颅，幻头蛇便会获得虚幻之颚打击。任何攻击虚幻头颅或使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}动作检查的生物能能够尝试识破幻术（@Check[will|dc:27]豁免）。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.NZ3MrmXkmfQuJp7S]{效果：虚幻头颅}

Reactive Heads.name: 多头反应 Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: 多头蛇除第一个头外，每多一个头，都能获得一个额外的反应动作，但只能用此反应动作进行反应打击。多头蛇针对同一个触发动作只能使用一次反应动作，即便一个生物在它的触及范围离开多个方格，并且每次反应打击都必须使用不同的头部。每当多头蛇被砍掉一个头，它每轮就失去一个额外的反应动作。

Junk Nest.name: Junk Nest
Junk Nest.description: The scroungefeather's nest of sharp metallic junk covers a 15-foot-by-15-foot area. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain to any non-scroungefeather creatures. A creature that moves on the ground through the nest takes @Damage[3[piercing]] damage for each square of the area it moves into. Scroungefeathers can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} at any point in the nest.

Tossed Scraps.name: Tossed Scraps
Tossed Scraps.description:
Requirements The scroungefeather has Grabbed Debris

Effect The scroungefeather flings the debris at a target within 20 feet, making an attack roll with a +12 modifier. On a success, the target takes @Damage[(2d10+5)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Grab Debris.name: Grab Debris
Grab Debris.description:
Requirements The scroungefeather is in its nest or another environment rich with debris

Effect The scroungefeather uses an Interact action to grab an item with its beak, selected randomly; roll 1d4 to determine the type of debris. The scroungefeather gains access to the listed abilities until it uses Tossed Scraps to discard the debris or until it Releases the debris. The scroungefeather can't use its beak attack while it is using its beak to Grab Debris.

d4ItemEffect
1Armor scrapThe scroungefeather gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC.
2Shattered bladeThe scroungefeather gains a broken blade melee Strike with a +12 attack modifier that deals 2d10+6 slashing damage.
3Unexploded bombWhen the scroungefeather throws this with Tossed Scraps, all the damage is fire damage, and the bomb also deals 3 fire splash damage.
4Faulty wandThe scroungefeather gains a magic bolt ranged Strike witha +14 attack modifier that deals 2d6+6 force damage.

Fearless Rush.name: 无畏冲刺 Fearless Rush
Fearless Rush.description:
触发 犀角兽陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]状态

效果 犀角兽减少自身1点惊惧状态值（最低到0）。犀角兽随后朝一名敌人行走。

Ghost Touch.name: 幽冥 Ghost Touch
Ghost Touch.description: 犀角兽的打击具有幽冥性能符文的效果。

Impaling Charge.name: 刺穿冲锋 Impaling Charge
Impaling Charge.description: 犀角兽行走两次，然后用角进行一次打击。如果此次打击命中，还将造成1d10持续流血伤害。

Idyllic Panorama.name: 田园风光 Idyllic Panorama
Idyllic Panorama.description:
频率 每小时一次

效果 守望者创造出一片宁静祥和的区域。这等同于5环的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{海市蜃楼 Mirage}，描绘了宁静草场或森林的风光，除了区域为@Template[burst|distance:200]范围。

当处于田园风光的区域内时，守望者对区域内生物的感官有显著的掌控力，并且可以随意施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{假象术 Mislead}和2环的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{沉默术 Silence}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 守望者对处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外3d6精准伤害。

Scent (Imprecise) 1 mile.name: 灵敏嗅觉 (模糊) 1 英里

Wild Trickery.name: 荒野诡计 Wild Trickery
Wild Trickery.description:
触发 60尺内一名敌人以守望者为攻击，法术或其他能力的目标

效果 触发生物必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:45]豁免。如果失败，守望者发出一阵心灵笑声，将触发能力重定向到射程内一个不同生物身上；如果没有其他符合条件的目标，则无效果。触发生物之后临时免疫24小时，除非他豁免大失败。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

守望者将其体型变为超小型，小型，中形，或超大型（变为超小型时其触及变为0尺，中型或大型变为5尺，超大型变为10尺）。守望者的外形不变，但可以将其颜色变为任意季节的色系。

Forest Passage.name: 林地穿行 Forest Passage
Forest Passage.description: 森林与草场的守望者忽视由非魔法植物形成的困难地形和高等困难地形。

Fox's Wager.name: 狐之赌注 Fox's Wager
Fox's Wager.description:
守望者授予他能看见的一个除他以外的自愿生物一道恩惠，请求该生物承诺使用被授予的来摧毁或根除文明的造物。目标在对由类人生物制造的构装体，物体和建筑的攻击掷骰上获得+1状态加值，在伤害上获得+5状态加值。它还将在对抗类人生物时，在隐秘检定上获得+2状态加值。守望者一次只能授予一份赌注。赌注会在目标被捕获或死亡时结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Hc0BhuLHaldO3vqG]{效果：狐之赌注}

Magical Pounce.name: 魔法扑击 Magical Pounce
Magical Pounce.description: 守望者行走至多其速度的距离，跳跃至多其速度的距离，或是施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元移位 Translocate}；在该次移动结束时，守望者进行打击。如果守望者在开始此动作前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，他会保持藏匿直到此能力的打击结束。

Voice of Nature.name: Voice of Nature
Voice of Nature.description: Though the Wardens of the Wild do not speak in words, they can communicate complex concepts flawlessly and wordlessly with any animal, beast, plant, or other creature of the natural world through prolonged eye contact. Sapient creatures with strong ties to the natural world, such as animal instinct barbarians or druids who speak the Wildsong, can somewhat understand a Warden of the Wild, though the meaning can be vague.

Warden's Crown.description: A Warden of the Wild's horned crown commands respect from wild creatures. Wild creatures native to a warden's biome automatically improve their attitude toward it by one step (up to friendly) and typically do not take hostile actions towards each other while in the warden's presence.
Warden's Crown.name: Warden's Crown

Warden of Forests and Meadows.name: 森林与草场的守望者 Warden of Forests and Meadows
Warden of Forests and Meadows.allSaves: 对抗原能时所有豁免+1状态加值

Flickering Dash.name: Flickering Dash
Flickering Dash.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The rift chameleon Strides twice. During this movement, it flits quickly between the Universe and the Ethereal Plane, gaining resistance 5 to physical damage.

Extradimensional Gullet.name: Extradimensional Gullet
Extradimensional Gullet.description: The rift chameleon's innards exist partially on the Ethereal Plane, allowing it to swallow any number of creatures, even ones larger than itself. Creatures that @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} or cut themselves free from the chameleon's stomach reappear in the Universe adjacent to the rift chameleon's position. Creatures cannot escape from the rift chameleon's gullet using teleportation effects unless those effects can also cross planar boundaries.

Ethereal Camouflage.name: Ethereal Camouflage
Ethereal Camouflage.description: A rift chameleon can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, even if it doesn't have cover, but it cannot be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

Tongue Pull.name: Tongue Pull
Tongue Pull.description: Any creature hit by the rift chameleon's tongue is pulled adjacent to the chameleon. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the next Strike the rift chameleon makes against it this round.

Rift Chameleon.name: Rift Chameleon
Rift Chameleon.publicNotes: Rift chameleons are best known for their unsettling ability to swallow creatures significantly larger than themselves, thanks to a digestive tract that connects to its own pocket of the Ethereal Plane. When two or more rift chameleons remain in proximity for extended periods of time, their partially extradimensional nature begins to subtly warp the surrounding terrain. Direction and distance become confused to all but the lizards, making it easy for locals to get lost in places they once thought familiar.

Burrowing Retreat.name: Burrowing Retreat
Burrowing Retreat.description:
Trigger The hardhead mole is hit by a Strike

Effect The hardhead mole immediately Burrows to a burrow hole if there is one within 20 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Shovel Earth.name: Shovel Earth
Shovel Earth.description: The hardhead mole leaves a burrow hole in its square or an adjacent square. The square becomes difficult terrain but can be flattened back into normal terrain with an Interact action.

Unbalancing Burrow.name: Unbalancing Burrow
Unbalancing Burrow.description: The hardhead mole Burrows up to 20 feet in a straight line, displacing the earth on the surface. Any creature it passes through takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:14|basic] save). On a failed save, a creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. This creates a burrow hole at the beginning and end of the line.

Blood Scent.name: 血液嗅觉 Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: 鲨鱼能闻到水中最远1英里范围内的血腥味。

Camouflage.name: 伪装 Camouflage
Camouflage.description: 地精鲨的颜色和水融为一体。当它在水下尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]的隐秘检定时不需要掩蔽。

Electrolocation.name: 回声定位 Electrolocation
Electrolocation.description: 地精鲨能感知活物产生的微小电流，它可以在20尺内使用这种精确感官。

Grasping Jaws.name: 紧咬之颚 Grasping Jaws
Grasping Jaws.description: 成功从地精鲨的颚中@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]的生物会受到@Damage[1d6[bleed]]伤害，因为鲨鱼的咬合会撕裂其肌肉。

Lunging Bite.name: 突刺咬击 Lunging Bite
Lunging Bite.description: 地精向前冲刺，伸出颚咬击生物。它可以直线游泳最多10尺，并进行一次具有10尺触及范围的颚打击。

Fangtooth School.name: 尖牙鱼群 Fangtooth School
Fangtooth School.publicNotes: 这种鱼的可怕牙齿十分巨大，以至于它很难把嘴合上。这些鱼类甚至会将比自己大得多的生物视为潜在的食物，并在夜晚的黑暗中向水面上升。

Sunless Sight.name: 无光视觉 Sunless Sight
Sunless Sight.description: 当在明亮光照下时，尖牙鱼陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

Bite and Gnaw.name: 噬咬咀嚼 Bite and Gnaw
Bite and Gnaw.description: 鱼群占据空间内的每个敌人受到@Damage[2d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:19|basic]豁免）。

Concert Frog.name: 奏鸣蛙 Concert Frog
Concert Frog.publicNotes: 这些巨大的蛙类将它们的卵储存在胃里。当卵孵化时，小蝌蚪会爬到父母的嘴里，加入庆祝的鸣叫和呱呱声，融入家庭的歌声中。

Conduct.name: 指挥演奏 Conduct
Conduct.description:
其中一只小蛙开始唱歌，给予奏鸣蛙和所有在60尺范围内的盟友三种效果中的一种，效果持续到奏鸣蛙的下一个回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.I4C55X7AzchlF9FM]{效果: 指挥演奏}

  • 红色 给予速度+10尺的状态加值。
  • Blue 给予AC和强韧豁免+1的状态加值。
  • Yellow 盟友在攻击检定上获得+1的状态加值，并成功的近战打击会额外造成@Damage[1d4[sonic]]伤害，因为它们的攻击会产生共鸣。

Three-Frog Orchestra.name: 三蛙乐团 Three-Frog Orchestra
Three-Frog Orchestra.description: 奏鸣蛙的嘴唇后面蹲着三只颜色各异的小蛙。生物可以特意攻击其中一只小蛙。如果有任何小蛙死亡，奏鸣蛙在其回合结束时进行一次@Check[flat|dc:11]检定；成功时，新的小蛙会在其胃中孵化并出现在音乐蛙的嘴唇处。

Whisker Sense.name: 胡须感知 Whisker Sense
Whisker Sense.description: 海豹可以使用其胡须精确感知指定范围内的振动，但这种感官仅限于水下。

Aquatic Feast.name: 水中佳肴 Aquatic Feast
Aquatic Feast.description:
需求 一个中型或更小体型的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]于港湾海豹的颚

效果 港湾海豹游泳最多10尺，带着受擒的生物一同移动，并且造成@Damage[1d8[slashing]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:18|basic]豁免）。

Ghost Ape.name: Ghost Ape

Ghost Stance.name: Ghost Stance
Ghost Stance.description: The ghost ape phases partially out of existence, its form blurring and becoming difficult to pinpoint. While in this stance, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to any creature that isn't adjacent to them. They can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. They also gain resistance 5 to physical damage. If the ghost ape takes force damage, this stance ends and they can't reenter it for [[/br 1d3 #rounds]]{1d3 rounds}.

Phantom Step.name: Phantom Step
Phantom Step.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The ghost ape moves quickly, passing through the Ethereal Plane. They teleport up to a distance equal to twice their Speed within their line of sight.

Terrifying Display.name: Terrifying Display
Terrifying Display.description: The ghost ape beats their chest in a terrifying display. Creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} must succeed a @Check[will|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). While a creature is frightened by this ability, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the ape. On a success, the creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Ghost Ape.publicNotes: Ghost apes are reclusive and territorial creatures that usually reveal themselves only when their homes are threatened. Most ghost apes will first attempt to use their imposing presence and natural teleportation to frighten and confuse their foes into fleeing. Ghost apes can speak but aren't particularly talkative, though they will, on rare occasions, treat with those who approach them with respect. Ghost apes can be powerful allies when motivated by a common cause, although they tend to be suspicious of outsiders, and their trust isn't easily earned.

Cliff Climber.name: Cliff Climber
Cliff Climber.description: A stony goat can trot across the steepest cliffs. It doesn't need to attempt @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} checks to scale inclines, and it isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} while Climbing an incline. It ignores difficult terrain caused by rocks, rubble, and uneven ground made of earth and stone.

Self-Petrify.name: Self-Petrify
Self-Petrify.description:
Trigger The stony goat gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition or takes more than 8 damage in a single hit

Effect The stony goat turns to stone in self-defense. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} condition for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. If the goat is damaged while it's petrified, it immediately heals by that amount by absorbing minerals from its cud, causing its cud to lose value equal to the amount of Hit Points restored (for instance, losing 5 gp worth of value to restore 5 Hit Points); if the goat's cud is reduced to 0 gp, it has the minerals fully drained from it, and the goat won't form more cud until it has eaten a sufficient quantity of rock and slept.

Stone Bolt.description:
Trigger The stony goat loses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} condition

Effect The stony goat's first instinct is to escape. It Strides with a +20 circumstance bonus to its Speed.
Stone Bolt.name: Stone Bolt

Overhead Leap.name: Overhead Leap
Overhead Leap.description: The stony goat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaps} up to 12 feet vertically and 20 feet horizontally; this movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Shove and Run.name: Shove and Run
Shove and Run.description: The stony goat attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the nearest creature and then Strides with a +20-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Stonefish Swarm.name: 石头鱼群 Stonefish Swarm
Stonefish Swarm.publicNotes: 石头鱼偶尔会在食物丰富的地方聚集在一起，填满珊瑚礁的各个角落和缝隙。当数量众多时，石头鱼可以捕猎比它们自身大得多的猎物。

Defensive Spines.name: 防御性尖刺 Defensive Spines
Defensive Spines.description: 当生物进入石头鱼群占据的空间时，生物受到@Damage[1d4[piercing]]伤害，并且暴露于石头鱼群毒液的影响下。

Reef Camouflage.name: 珊瑚礁伪装 Reef Camouflage
Reef Camouflage.description: 直到下一次行动，石头鱼群能让自己看上去像一块五彩斑斓的珊瑚礁。在掩饰成珊瑚礁的欺骗检定和DC中，它自动获得26的结果。

Inject Poison.name: 注射毒液 Inject Poison
Inject Poison.description: 集群占据空间内的每个敌人受到@Damage[2d4[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:18|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物还会暴露于石头鱼群毒液的影响下。

Stonefish Swarm Venom.name: 石头鱼群毒液 Stonefish Swarm Venom
Stonefish Swarm Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] 和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 1d6毒素伤害@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害和笨拙2 (1轮)

Soporific Spores.name: 催眠孢子 Soporific Spores
Soporific Spores.description: 孢背蛙摇动背上的植物和真菌，直到它们释放出一片@Template[emanation|distance:20]范围的孢子云。该区域内的所有生物必须通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:22]豁免，否则会变得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟（若大失败则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3}）。此能力在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Soporific Spores]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用。

Seed Spores.name: 种植孢子 Seed Spores
Seed Spores.description: 被孢背蛙舌打击命中的生物会受到@Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]]伤害，因为真菌孢子开始在其体内生长。

Sporeback Frog.name: 孢背蛙 Sporeback Frog
Sporeback Frog.publicNotes: 这种掘地蛙会将自己埋在潮湿的土壤中，让有毒的苔藓和毒蘑菇在它的身体上生长。

Spectral Mount.name: 幽魂坐骑 Spectral Mount
Spectral Mount.description: 灰马可以被具有肉体的骑手骑乘，但如果灰马穿过一个生物或物体，骑手就会被留下。

Aura of Despair.name: 绝望灵光 Aura of Despair
Aura of Despair.description: 30尺。在灵光范围内开始回合的活物必须成功通过一次@Check[will|dc:27]豁免，否则将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。取得大成功的生物临时免疫此灵光1小时。

Spectral Charge.name: 幽魂冲锋 Spectral Charge
Spectral Charge.description: 灰马行走两次，然后进行一次角打击。灰马可以移动穿越生物。

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: The lightning turtle can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

Shell Shock.name: Shell Shock
Shell Shock.description:
Trigger A lightning turtle is hit by a melee or an unarmed attack

Effect The lightning turtle releases some of its stored electrical power, inflicting @Damage[7d6[electricity]] damage to the creature attacking it.

Greater Electrolocation.name: Greater Electrolocation
Greater Electrolocation.description: A lightning turtle can sense minute electrical charges in living creatures, which it can use as a precise sense at a range of 20 feet. This distance increases to 100 feet against any creature that has used an electricity effect within the last minute.

Healing Pulse.name: Healing Pulse
Healing Pulse.description: The lightning turtle releases a pulse of low-intensity electricity from its body to promote healing. This restores @Damage[5d8[healing]] Hit Points to the turtle and each living ally within 10 feet, including creatures normally immune to electricity. The turtle can't use Healing Pulse again for 1 minute and is temporarily immune to the Healing Pulse of any lightning turtle for 1 minute.

Sparking Shell.name: Sparking Shell
Sparking Shell.description: The lightning turtle withdraws into its shell. This increases its AC to 36, but it can't act except to use Shell Shock or reemerge as a single action. While in its shell, the turtle's Shell Shock deals another 4d6 damage and loses the nonlethal trait.

Transparency.description: Unless it has fed recently, the sky fisher is naturally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. Using non-hostile actions does not cause the sky fisher to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}. When it takes a hostile action of any kind, the sky fisher is hidden instead of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} until the start of its next turn, as the vague outline of its many tendrils temporarily becomes faintly visible.
Transparency.name: Transparency

Abduct.description: The sky fisher reels in a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by its tentacles, pulling them into an adjacent space, and then attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Swallow them Whole} (Large, @Damage[(3d8+12)[acid]], Rupture 25). The sky fisher can only use Swallow Whole when using Abduct.
Abduct.name: Abduct

Enzymic Vent.description: The sky fisher vents flesh-eating enzymes into the air, dealing @Damage[3d6[persistent,acid],3d6[bleed]]{3d6 persistent acid damage and 3d6 persistent bleed damage} in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic] save). It can't use Enzymic Vent again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Enzymic Vent]]{1d4 rounds}.
Enzymic Vent.name: Enzymic Vent

Jet.description: The sky fisher quickly expels some of its gases to move swiftly through the air, Flying up to 100 feet in a straight line; this movement doesn't trigger reactions.
Jet.name: Jet

Sky Fisher Venom.name: Sky Fisher Venom
Sky Fisher Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and can't speak above a whisper (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d8[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and can't speak (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d10[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

label: 荒野之嚎 Howl of the Wild
